product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner
product_description: A bestselling, gentle PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
target_skin_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing in the AM and PM, dispense into your palms and gently press into your face and neck until fully absorbed. 
-Can also be applied with a cotton pad. 
-Follow with sunscreen during the day.
-Avoid eye area. 

Recycling Instructions:
-Remove the cap and plastic inner lid. 
-Wash the glass jar with hot water to fully remove any remaining product.
-Dry jar thoroughly. 
-Up-cycle the glass jar or recycle it along with the plastic cap and inner lid per your local guidelines.
-Glow Recipe also offers a recycling send-back program with its partner TerraCycle® for products that cannot be recycled locally.

product_description: A potent 15 percent  vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve the signs of photoaging.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:Directions:STEP 1- Tap to loosen powder.STEP 2- Slowly pour liquid into powder.STEP 3- Screw pump on tightly and wipe clean.STEP 4- Shake until powder is dissolved.STEP 5- Snap onto white bottle with nozzle facing left and white bottle facing forward.Mix it once and you’re good to glow!

WARNING: Mix only as intended. Avoid contact with eyes.

Suggested use:-In the morning, apply one pump to a clean, dry face, neck, chest, and backs of hands, or mix it into your daily Drunk Elephant skincare smoothie.

product_description: A high-strength vitamin-and-mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
target_skin_concerns: Pores and Oiliness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply a few drops to entire face in morning and evening before heavier creams.

Precautions:
-If topical vitamin C is used as part of skincare, it should be applied at alternate times with this formula in the AM. Otherwise, niacinamide can affect integrity of pure-form vitamin C.

product_name: Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops Serum
product_description: A breakthrough, multi-use highlighting serum that hydrates and visibly reduces the look of hyperpigmentation for a dewy, reflective glow—without mica, glitter, or gray cast.
target_skin_concerns: Dryness and Dullness
how_to_use:
How to use for a Natural Glow:

As a brightening serum step:
Apply 1 pump before moisturizer to get long-lasting, glowing skin results.
As a priming step: 
Apply 1–2 pumps as the last step in your skin-care routine before makeup.

How to Use for a Maximum Glow:
On a no-makeup day, apply 1–2 pumps as the last step of your entire routine. 

Extra Dew Drops Hacks:
Over makeup: Pick up the formula using the ring finger and dab off excess on the back of your hand. Then gently pat “a drop of dew” on the high points of the face in a tapping motion.
As a primer:  Apply 1–2 pumps as the last step in your skin-care routine before makeup for a smooth finish and glow. 
Mix with foundation: Mix “a drop of dew” into foundation for a boost of hydration and glow.
For your eyes: Dab a pea-sized amount to the center of the eyelid and blend out.
For a Double Highlight: Pat a drop below complexion makeup and then layer with a powder highlighter on top."

product_name: T.L.C. Framboos™ Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum
product_description: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-In the evening, apply to a clean, dry face (and even to the chest and backs of hands), avoiding the eye area.
-Mix with Virgin Marula Oil (sold separately) for a dose of moisture and barrier-boosting fatty acids. 
-Note: Slight tingling may be experienced, particularly for the first few days of application. This typically dissipates as your skin becomes adjusted. Start slowly by using every other night.                                                              
-Tip: Also works incredibly well as a spot treatment!       

Warning: 
-Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use immediately if irritation occurs and consult a physician. Use a sunscreen daily while using this product and for a week after ceasing use. Product’s contact with skin must be of limited frequency or duration. 

Smoothie tip:
-Tip: Try Drunk Elephant’s "Oh What a Night Smoothie" (sold separately) for smoother, hydrated, more radiant skin. In the palm of your hand mix one pump T.L.C. Framboos™, one pump Lala Retro™ (sold separately), and one pump B-Hydra™ (sold separately) and apply to skin.

product_name: D-Bronzi™ Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides
product_description: A serum that defends against pollution and environmental stressors—delivered with a bronzy glow.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake before use. 
-Add a drop or more of D-Bronzi™ to any Drunk Elephant serum, oil, or cream for a gorgeous glow and a potent dose of protective antioxidants and omega fatty acids.
-May be applied to face, chest, legs, or anywhere else you want a touch of bronze.

Smoothie tips:
-Try DE’s "Glow Big Smoothie" for a just-got-back-from-somewhere sunny glow. In the palm of your hand, mix one drop D-Bronzi™, one pump C-Frima™, one pump B-Hydra™, and top it off with Umbra Sheer™ (each product sold separately). Apply to skin.
-Try DE’s "Here comes the smoothie" for a healthy, bronzed glow. In the palm of your hand, mix one drop D-Bronzi™, one to two drops Virgin Marula Oil, and one pump B-Hydra™ (each product sold separately), and apply to skin.

How To Refill: 1. Remove cap and unscrew pump.2. Remove empty inner jar.3. Insert refill pod into outer jar and remove film seal.4. Immediately screw pump back on tightly.Do not touch product or underside of pump to avoid contamination. How To Recycle Refill: Wait! Don’t throw me away—I’m recyclable!
Smoothie Tips: -Try Drunk Elephant‘s "Oh What a Night Smoothie" for smoother, hydrated, more radiant-looking skin. In palm of your hand, mix one pump T.L.C. Framboos™ (sold separately), one pump Lala Retro™, and one pump B-Hydra™ (sold separately) and apply to skin.-Try Drunk Elephant‘s "Passion Play Smoothie" for hydrated, radiant-, younger-looking skin. In the palm of your hand, mix a pea-size amount of A-Passioni™ (sold separately), one pump of B-Hydra™ (sold separately), and one pump of Lala™ and apply to skin

product_description: A high-strength serum with 15 percent pure vitamin C to visibly improve skin’s brightness, firmness, stubborn discoloration, and dull and uneven tone.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply two to three drops to your face once or twice daily. 
-Apply two to three more drops to your neck and chest. 
-May be used alone or added to your favorite non-SPF moisturizer or serum. 
-Can be applied under the eye area; avoid direct eye contact. 
-For daytime wear, finish with SPF 30+.

product_description: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and Tasmanian pepperberry.
target_skin_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Use ideally in the PM and do not exceed once-daily use.
-After cleaning, saturate a cotton pad with the formula and sweep across face and neck.
-Do not rinse off.
-Continue with additional skin treatments as needed.

Precautions:
-Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes.
-This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.
-Use only as directed.
-Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.
-This formula should not be used on sensitive, peeling, or compromised skin. If persistent irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician.
-Please note that Tasmanian pepperberry derivative included in this formula is of plant origin and varies in color seasonally, and this color variation may be apparent in the formula from time to time.

product_description: A silky vegan balm that hydrates and soothes parched lips in seconds.

how_to_use:

Strawberry Smooth BHA + AHA Salicylic Serum:-To gently smooth rough texture and clear pores and breakouts while calming and hydrating skin, dispense one to two pumps and gently pat onto slightly damp face and neck until fully absorbed.-Pro Tip: Combine with Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops for double the benefits! Apply Strawberry BHA + AHA Salicylic Serum and layer with Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops.

product_description: A pack of cleansing or exfoliating wipes infused with micellar water to quickly remove makeup for visibly clearer, brighter skin.
target_skin_concerns: Dryness and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Cleansing:
-Twice a day, wipe your face and eyes with a cleansing wipe to remove all traces of makeup.
-If necessary, focus on the areas with heavy makeup, such as lips and eyelashes.
-Do not rinse after use.
-Dispose of the wipe. 
-Make sure you properly close the top of the pack after use. 

Exfoliating: 
-Once a day, wipe all over your face, taking care to avoid contact with your eyes.
-Focus on the T-zone (forehead, nose, chin) in case of impurities.
-No need to rinse.
-Dispose of the wipe. 
-Make sure you properly close the top of the pack after use.

-Over makeup: Pick up the formula, using the ring finger, and dab off excess on the back of your hand. Then gently pat "a drop of dew" on the high points of the face in a tapping motion.
-As a primer: Apply one to two pumps as the last step in your skincare routine before makeup for a smooth finish and glow. 
-Mix with foundation: Mix "a drop of dew" into foundation for a boost of hydration and glow.
-For your eyes: Dab a pea-size amount to the center of the eyelid and blend out.
-For a double highlight: Pat a drop below complexion makeup and layer with a powder highlighter on top.

-Prep lips with this smooth, hydrating base to fill the look of lines, so lipstick can glide on effortlessly.
-Apply over your favorite lip color for added hydration and a high-shine, glossy finish.
-Apply as the last step of your routine to lock in moisture overnight.

Recycling Instructions:
-Partially made of recycled glass, Glow Recipe’s bottles and jars are 100 percent recyclable and designed to be repurposed. 
-Every part of the packaging is recyclable.
-Rinse your tube and send it to TerraCycle®. 
-Glow Recipe partners with TerraCycle® on a no-waste recycling program. Request your recycling envelope and follow the steps to have your empties collected and converted into raw materials that can be used to manufacture new household items.

product_description: A gentle mineral and chemical sunscreen that hydrates, visibly boosts skin’s glow, and evens the appearance of skin tone over time with niacinamide, hyaluronic acid, and aloe.
target_skin_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Shake before use. 
-Apply liberally—more than your moisturizer—on face, neck, and décolletage. 
-Reapply every two hours.
-Let your skincare steps fully absorb before SPF application. After applying SPF, wait for it to set before makeup application to prevent pilling.
-When applying, work in sections. Pat in—don’t rub!
-Tip for reapplying over makeup or over facial hair: Apply little dots and pat it in gently with your fingertips or a sponge.

Recycling Instructions:
-Remove the cap and plastic inner lid. 
-Wash the glass jar with hot water to fully remove any remaining product, and dry thoroughly. 
-Upcycle the glass jar or recycle it along with the plastic cap and inner lid per your local guidelines.
-Glow Recipe also offers a recycling send-back program with its partner TerraCycle® for products that cannot be recycled locally.

Suggested Usage:
To visibly boost your complexion:
-Starting from your lower cheeks, sweep cream out and up.
-Tap your fingertips across your cheeks, avoiding your eye contour.

To visibly define your contours:
-Use your fingers to smooth outward and upward beneath your cheekbones. 

To visibly define your jawline:
-Gently pinch your chin with your fingers, moving up your jawline in one sweeping motion.

To smooth the appearance of your forehead:
-Starting in the middle of your forehead, massage in circular motions, moving out toward your temples.
-Pat any excess product in with your ring finger.

product_description: Shop Shiseido’s Facial Cotton at Sephora. These super-soft cotton pads are for application and makeup removal.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
To apply softener:
-Pour softener onto the cotton pad after cleansing.
-Wrap the cotton around the inner middle finger between the index and ring fingers.
-Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth softener across forehead, from nose to cheeks, around lips, upward from chest to neck, and under chin.

To remove eye makeup:
-Pour makeup remover onto three cotton pads—one for each eye and a third for your eyelashes. 
-Rest a cotton pad over each lid and hold it in place for a few seconds, then gently wipe downward and off skin.
-Place the remaining cotton pad onto the lashes of each eye. Hold it in place for a few seconds to break down the mascara, then wipe from the base to the tip of your eyelashes, starting from the outer to the inner corner and back again. Repeat on your other eye. 
-Follow with cleanser.

To apply:

-Continue to use throughout the day to mattify shine and reapply your SPF.

To open:
-Remove the cap, slide down the clear plastic sleeve, and remove the yellow pin from the center of the brush.
-Twist the body of the brush from the closed position to open.
-Tilt and tap the brush gently against your wrist until the powder flows through the bristles.
-Use powder generously to reapply your UV protection.

To close: 
-Twist the body of the brush from the open position to closed, being careful not to twist beyond the closed position. 
-Pull up the clear plastic sleeve and snap the cap back on.

product_name: Bye Bye Bumps - Best of Body Kit
product_description: A kit of three First Aid Beauty body favorites that help exfoliate, resurface, and hydrate skin.
target_skin_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
KP Smoothing Body Lotion with 10% AHA:
-Apply daily to clean, dry skin all over body or problem areas.
-Not intended for facial use.
-KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub (sold separately) and KP Smoothing Body Lotion are both formulated to help reduce bumps associated with keratosis pilaris. Both products contain 10 percent AHA and can be used effectively on their own. Given the powerful level of AHA in both formulations, First Aid Beauty recommends using the KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub one to two times per week and using the KP Smoothing Body Lotion on non-scrub days, and not using both products on the same day.
-Avoid using on the same day you’ve shaved.
-As with any new skincare product, First Aid Beauty also recommends doing a patch test to see how your skin reacts.

Ingrown Hair Pads with BHA & AHA:
-Swipe a pad over clean, dry skin daily.
-Begin using a day after shaving or waxing.
-Can be used on underarms, bikini area, face/neck, legs, and anywhere else you remove hair.
-Sunburn alert: Alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub with 10% AHA:
-Use one to two times a week as tolerated.
-Apply onto wet skin and gently massage with fingertips onto problem areas.
-Rinse and pat dry.
-Follow with moisturizer.
-Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.
-If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician.
-Not intended for facial use.
-Use only as directed.
-Keep out of reach of children.
-Anyone can use this product. A patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin.
-This product contains glycolic and lactic acids that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

Recycling Instructions:
-Always check your state and local recycling guidelines.  

Carton:  
-Break down carton and place in trash. 

Tubes: 
-Remove pull tab and place in trash before use.
-Unscrew cap and rinse excess product.
-Snip tube at neck to separate. 
-Recycle all with like plastics.

Jar: 
-Remove pull tab and place in trash before use.  
-Rinse lid and jar. 
-Screw lid and jar closed to recycle with plastics.

product_name: Wake Up With Me Morning Routine Kit
product_description: A complete morning routine including all the must-haves for glowing, radiant skin
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Dark Circles

-Cleanse skin with Ceramic Slip Clay Cleanser.
-After patting your skin dry, mist Pink Drink Firming + Resurfacing Essence onto your face.
-Massage into your skin and let dry.
-Next, apply two to three drops of C.E.O. Glow Oil to your face and neck.
-Follow with two pumps of C.E.O. Vitamin C Serum (or mix them together and apply as a skin cocktail).
-Follow with one to two pumps of Good Genes on your face and neck.
-Pat one to two pumps of Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream around the eye area, starting under the eye and continuing to the outer corners (in the crow's feet area). 
-Then, apply under the browbone for a lifting effect.
-Lastly, apply to CEO Afterglow Moisturizer to face, neck, and décolleté.

product_name: Travel-Size Start'r Set: Dry Skin Edition
product_description: A three-step set that includes a cleanser, toner, sunscreen, and body cream sample.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Dryness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Start with the Melt Awf Jelly Oil Makeup-Melting Cleanser. Use during the morning or at night. Massage into dry or damp skin then add water and continue massaging to break down makeup. Rinse, then pat dry. 
-Follow with the Fat Water Hydrating Milky Toner Essence. Apply to palms, then pat and press over your face, letting it absorb.
-Finish with the Hydra Vizor Broad Spectrum Mineral SPF 30 Sunscreen Moisturizer. Apply evenly on clean, dry skin. 

Recycling Instructions:
-Dry Skin Edition box is 100 percent recyclable. Its protective outer box is made of FSC material and is recyclable. FSC certification ensures that our boxes come from responsibly managed forests.
Melt Awf Jelly Oil Makeup-Melting Cleanser:
-The bottle is made with 50 percent PCR (aka post-consumer recycled material).
-The bottle and cap are recyclable depending on your region—check your local guidelines. 
-When you’re done, pull off top and discard.
-Rinse and recycle the bottle and cap.

Fat Water Hydrating Milky Toner Essence:
-The bottle and cap are recyclable and both contain 50 percent PCR (post-consumer recycled material).
-Remove the clear disc in the neck of the bottle and throw the disc away.
-Separate the bottle and cap and recycle both.
 
Hydra Vizor Broad Spectrum Mineral SPF 30 Sunscreen Moisturizer:
-The bottle is recyclable.
-When you’re done, recycle the bottle and throw away the pump and cap.

product_description: A clean, cutting-edge formula with 1.0% vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Morning or night, apply a pea-size amount or less to a clean, dry face, avoiding the eye area. 
-May be mixed with any Drunk Elephant cream or oil.
-Limit initial use to once or twice a week, gradually increasing frequency to every other night, and then every night as tolerated. 
-Always use a broad-spectrum sunscreen such as Umbra" Sheer or Umbra" Tinte (both sold separately).
-Tip: Mix with B-Hydra™ (sold separately) for an extra shot of hydration and vitamin B.

Smoothie tips:
-Try Drunk Elephant’s "ABC Smoothie" for smoother, brighter, more hydrated skin. In the palm of your hand, mix a pea-size amount of A-Passioni™, one pump B-Hydra™, and one pump C-Firma™ (sold separately) and apply to skin. 
-Try Drunk Elephant’s "Passion Play Smoothie" for hydrated, radiant younger-looking skin. In the palm of your hand mix a pea-size amount of A-Passioni™, one pump of B-Hydra™, and one pump of Lala™ (sold separately), and apply to skin. 

Retinol products are not recommended for use by pregnant or nursing mothers. Always check with your doctor before using any new products while pregnant or nursing.

product_description: An essential set of bestselling treatments packed with powerful ingredients to reveal your most radiant, resilient skin.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness, Uneven Texture, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dark Circles
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Step one: Squalane + Marine Algae Eye Cream:
-Use ring finger to gently massage eye cream into the under-eye and browbone areas, morning and evening immediately after cleansing. 

Step two: Squalane + Lactic Acid Resurfacing Night Serum (evening only):
-Massage two to three pumps into skin, including your neck and décolleté, nightly.

Step three: Squalane + Omega Repair Cream:
-Gently massage into skin, including your neck and décolleté, to hydrate and plump the look of fine lines.

Step four: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil:
-As the last step in your routine, gently press a few drops into skin to lock in long-lasting hydration.
-Pro tip: Add a drop or two to your foundation for a natural, dewy finish.

Recycling Instructions:
Marine Algae Eye Cream, Vitamin C Rose Oil & Omega Repair Cream:
-Separate and dispose of caps and dropper.
-Empty and rinse remaining product from jar.
-Place in curbside recycling.

Lactic Acid Resurfacing Night Serum:
-Remove and dispose of bottle and pump.
-Place cap in curbside recycling.

The outer carton is made from sustainable FSC-certified sugarcane paper and can be placed in curbside recycling.

-Rinse and pat dry. 
-Follow with moisturizer. 

 Precautions:
-Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. 
-If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician.
-Not intended for facial use. 
-Use only as directed.
-Keep out of reach of children. 
-Anyone can use this product. A patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin.
-This product contains glycolic and lactic acids that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

product_name: Shani Darden by Déesse PRO LED Light Mask
product_description: An FDA-cleared LED light therapy mask and neck piece that uses the latest technology to reduce the look of acne, pigmentation, and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing and thoroughly drying face and neck, apply the Shani Darden by Déesse PRO LED Light Therapy Mask.
-Select your desired mode. 
-Remove after the ten-minute session.
-Follow with a hydrating serum and/or a moisturizer. 
-For blemishes, best results are seen after using up to four days a week over six weeks. 
-For fine lines, wrinkles, and pigmentation, best results are seen after using five days a week for six weeks. 
-No additional benefits are seen by exceeding the treatment time or frequency.

product_name: #FauxFilter Luminous Matte Buildable Coverage Crease Proof Concealer
product_description: A buildable, creamy formula that can flex from medium to full coverage while it visibly brightens and conceals, is fragrance-free, long-wearing, crease-proof, and made to move with you.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply concealer under eyes and on dark spots, redness, and blemishes. 
-Blend using a brush or damp sponge. 
-Repeat for added coverage. 

For dark circles: 
-Lightly dot a lighter shade than your natural skin tone under the inner corner of your eye.
-Blend outward. 

For blemishes: 
-Lightly dot the shade closest to your natural skin tone onto the blemish.
-Let it set slightly.
-Lightly blend outward to keep coverage.

For redness: 
-Lightly dot the shade closest to your natural skin tone directly on any red or discolored areas.
-Blend outward.

Huda’s Hacks:
-Use a brighter shade under your eyes to brighten and refresh your complexion.
-Use your actual shade under contour and brows, or on your nose and chin for a polished, lifted look.

Recommendations:
-The INKEY List dermatologists recommend a patch test before using this product for the first time.
-Would not recommend using this product with vitamin C.
-For combination skin, oily T-zone, or non-active blemishes or breakouts, use The INKEY List’s Niacinamide serum at a lower percentage (10 percent)​ (sold separately).
-For mild blackheads, try The INKEY List Beta Hydroxy Acid (sold separately).

Recycling Instructions:
-Cut off the top.
-Use excess product, then rinse tube. 
-Recycle.

target_skin_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Uneven Texture

Morning: 
-Cleanse with Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser. 
-Follow with two to four pumps of 15% Vitamin C + Clean Caffeine Energy Serum and finish with Superfood Air-Whip Moisture Cream to visibly brighten and lock in hydration. 
-Top with your favorite SPF.

Evening:

-Add a few drops of Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Oil to Superfood Air-Whip Moisture Cream and massage into skin before heading into dreamland. 

Recycling Instructions:
-Take off caps and dispose into its proper container.
-You can check your local recycling authority's guidelines to make sure you use the correct one.
-Wash the glass jar thoroughly in hot soapy water, rinse, then dry.
-If you skip this step, containers may contaminate other materials in a mixed-waste stream, like paper.
-Place in your recycling bin, and voila, your glass jar can now be infinitely recycled.

product_name: Retinol Remix 1% Retinol Treatment With Peptide & Tranexamic Acid
product_description: A formula powered by one percent vegan retinol, peptide, and tranexamic acid that visibly reduces wrinkles, hyperpigmentation & large pores without leaving skin flakey & irritated.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to clean, dry skin. 
-Pump a pea-size amount onto your finger. 
-Distribute equally between the four quadrants of your face and neck (forehead, right cheek, left cheek, chin/neck). 
-Apply around orbital bone. 
-Avoid sensitive skin around eye area and corners of nose and mouth.
-Spread evenly across skin. 
-Allow to absorb for a couple of minutes, then layer 10 + 10 Moisturizer with 10% Vitamin C + 10% Peptide Complex + Ceramides (sold separately).
-Always wear broad-spectrum mineral SPF during the day while using retinol.

If you’re new to retinol: 
-Start by using two to three times per week at night. 
-If redness or irritation occurs, drop usage down to one to two times per week. 
-It can take skin a couple of weeks to get used to retinol, so start slow and build up.
-If applying directly causes sensitivity, try mixing with 10 + 10 Moisturizer with 10% Vitamin C + 10% Peptide Complex + Ceramides (sold separately) to soften the potency. These two products have a similar pH, so the benefits won't negate one another.

product_description: A brightening patch formulated with niacinamide and tranexamic-infused microneedles to fade the look of post-breakout dark spots and discolorations.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-After cleansing, apply a dot, textured-side down, on your dark spot. Don’t be scared by
the word "microneedle"—they’re as gentle as they are effective.
-Gently press into the skin for five to ten seconds.
-Wear overnight or for at least six hours for best results.
-Use two times per week for at least three to four consecutive weeks.
-Results may vary based on the type of dark spot you're targeting (sunspot, post-breakout
discoloration, age spot, etc.).
-See a little residue after removing? That’s OK, it’s just the sodium hyaluronate and can easily
be removed with a quick rinse, a soft cloth, or cotton round.

Hold up! Time for a skin barrier check:
-If you're experiencing any areas of excessive dryness, increased sensitivity, or open skin, or if you went a little heavy handed with peels, chemical exfoliation, or actives, give your skin a little resting time before using Peace Out’s dots or patches.

Newer to microneedling technology, brightening agents, or just have super sensitive skin? 
-Patch test first.
-While uncommon, there's a chance you may experience some slight redness or irritation from this type of delivery system, which is intended to maximize ingredient absorption and results. But don't worry. It should dissipate within 24 to 36 hours of removal (standard for microneedling). 
-Always ensure skin is clean and fully dry before application.
-If redness lasts longer than one to two days, please discontinue use.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to clean skin before your moisturizer in the AM and PM.
-Use one dropperful. 
-Smooth gently all over your face and throat.

Try Estée Lauder‘s Heart Ritual:
-Dispense a dropperful into the palm of your hand.
-Massage onto your face in a heart shape. Using all fingers of both hands, start at the center of your face and move out to your ears.
-Glide your hands from the sides of your face to down under your chin.
-Trace a larger heart from the middle of your forehead out to your temples.
-Glide down the sides of your face and close the heart again under your chin.
-Finish by gently massaging your neck in a downward motion.

product_description: A self-tanning face gel gradually enhances the skin’s appearance with a golden glow and intensifies after multiple applications.

-Wash hands well after use.
-Color variations may occur due to the natural DHA content.

Precautions:
-This product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn.
-Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin aging, skin cancer, and other harmful effects to the skin even if you do not burn.
-Avoid contact with eyes.
-Wash hands after use.

Recycling Instructions:
-Outer carton is made from sustainably maintained forests, decorated with plant-based inks, and is 100% recyclable as paper.
-Tube is made of 51% plastic from sugar cane residue and is recyclable: remove seal, empty and rinse tube if possible, replace lid, and recycle as plastic. Discard seal as waste.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Wet reusable applicator and your face with water (Fenty Skin suggests using it in the shower). Pour a dime-size amount of solution into the center of the wet applicator. Gently scrub face with the applicator for 30 to 60 seconds, working the solution into a plush lather. Rinse, pat dry, then follow with toner.
-If using during the day, make sure to follow up with Hydra Vizor (sold separately) to protect your skin from the sun as AHAs can increase UV sensitivity. If using at night, make sure to remove your makeup beforehand with Total Cleans‘r (sold separately), and then follow up with Instant Reset (sold separately) after use.
-For best results, use twice a week on non-consecutive days with the applicator. Those with sensitive skin may want to start by applying with fingers or using once a week.
-The applicator is machine washable. Place the applicator in a delicates bag and wash with cool water on a gentle cycle. Lay flat to air dry (do not stretch).
-Want to re-up and already have the Pre-Show Glow reusable applicator? Purchase the treatment refill separately.

product_description: A bestselling age-fighting routine powered by vitamin C, chemical exfoliants, and peptides to target visible signs of aging and transform your complexion.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:AM- Banana Bright Vitamin C Serum:-Apply evenly to face and neck daily. -Precautions: For external use only. Use as directed. This product contains a high percentage of vitamin C; patch test a small amount on forearm. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use. Sunburn Alert: Cover areas where AHAs/PHAs have been applied with sunscreen, or protective clothing prior to sun exposure, and for up to a week afterwards.
AM + PM- Strength Trainer Peptide Boost Moisturizer:-Apply evenly to face and neck morning and evening.-Precautions: For external use only. Use as directed.
PM- Glow2OH Dark Spot Toner:-At night, pour dark spot toner onto a cotton pad and swipe over clean, dry face in a circular motion. -Precautions: For external use only. Use as directed. This product contains active ingredients; we suggest testing a small amount on forearm. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product for a week afterward. Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

-Avoid contact with eyes.

product_description: A set that gently cleanses the skin, targets the look of dark circles, promotes visibly radiant and healthy-looking skin, and provides mild exfoliation.

how_to_use:

Squalane Cleanser:
-Dispense product into hands.

-Massage well onto dry face.
-Rinse with warm water.

Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG:
-Apply a small amount onto the eye contour in the morning and evening.

Ethylated Ascorbic Acid 15% Solution:
-Apply a few drops to the face in the morning and evening. 
-Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes. 
-Use sun protection during the day.

Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution:
-Use no more frequently than once daily, ideally in the evening. 
-After cleansing, saturate a cotton pad with the formula and sweep across the face and neck. 
-Do not use on sensitive, peeling, or compromised skin. 
-Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes. 
-Do not rinse oﬀ. 
-Continue with additional skincare products as needed. 
-Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.

Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.

Note: The Bright Set consists of four individual products containing ingredients that work to visibly brighten the skin. The Ordinary recommends using Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution and Ethylated Ascorbic Acid 15% Solution in separate regimens.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:Push, Peel, Twist & Mist!PUSH: At the top of the bottle (where the plastic is curled), use your thumb to push and release the plastic seal.PEEL: To unwrap the seal, peel the plastic around the perforated line of the cap in an upwards direction. Avoid peeling below the safety seal line to preserve the beautiful brown packaging!TWIST: Twist the cap to the right to open the nozzle.MIST: Your new Isle Nourishing Body Mist SPF 50 is ready to use! Be sure to apply liberally all over body 15 min prior to going into direct sunlight. Reapply every 80 minutes or as needed.
Recycling Instructions:-Empty packaging completely before tossing in the recycling bin. This bottle is fully recyclable when empty.-The all-aluminum bottle utilizes “bag on valve” technology, making it 100% recyclable in most municipalities. Once completely empty, simply remove the easy peel-away plastic label and recycle normally.- We partner with PACT Collective! Return your recyclables to PACT at select Sephora locations or visit PACT Collective for further instructions.

product_description: A mask formulated to target lackluster tone and textural irregularities.
target_skin_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:

-Leave on for no more than 10 minutes.
-Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

Precautions:
-Do not use on sensitive, peeling, or compromised skin.
-Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes during application and rinse-off.
-Patch testing prior to use is advised: Apply as directed to a small area once a day for three days to test if you are sensitive to this product.
-If you develop severe irritation, hives, swelling of eyes and mouth, blistering, or difficulty breathing, rinse off, cease use, and consult a physician right away.
-Keep out of reach of children.

Sunburn Alert: 
-This product contains a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.

-Limit time in the sun, especially from 10am to 2pm. 
-Wear long-sleeve shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses.  

For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product, keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Children under six months, ask a doctor. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If this product is swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

Gently pat dry. Follow with Personalized Day or Night Cream.

Personalized Night Cream:-In the evening, apply a dime-size amount of Personalized Night Cream to clean, damp skin.-Gently massage the product over your face and neck for one to two minutes using circular motions, allowing cream to sink in.

product_name: LUNA™ 4 Facial Cleansing & Firming Massage for Balanced Skin
product_description: A customizable tool that lifts away visible dirt, oil, and makeup residue on skin and offers firming facial massages.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-To unlock LUNA 4, pair with the FOREO For You app. 
-Once paired and settings decided, device can be used without the app.
-Remove all makeup, dampen skin, and apply your favorite cleanser.
-Press the universal button to turn on the LUNA 4.
-Choose between Gentle, Regular, or Deep Cleanse modes using the buttons on the device.
-Cleanse using circular movements on cheeks and forehead, gliding up and down the nose.
-Press and hold the button for three seconds to turn off device.
-Rinse and pat your face dry. 
-Apply other skincare products.
-Access firming massage manually or follow the instructions on the FOREO app to activate the firming massage function.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-To prep, cleanse with an oil-free cleanser or NuFACE Prep-N-Glow® Towelettes (sold separately).
-Lightly mist Supercharged IonPlex® Facial Mist onto skin to hydrate and prep skin for your microcurrent treatment. Shake well before use. 
-To boost this treatment, apply three to five drops of your favorite NuFACE Super Booster Serum (sold separately) onto fingertips and massage into skin until fully absorbed. 
-To activate and lift, use your NuFACE Clean Sweep Brush (sold separately). 
-Apply a mask-like layer of NuFACE Microcurrent Activator (sold separately) in sections as you lift. 
-Use your NuFACE microcurrent device (sold separately) to perform glides and holds. 
-Mist Supercharged IonPlex® Facial Mist over your activator for a surge of moisture, if desired. 
-To finish, apply eye cream, moisturizer, and SPF. 
-Mist on Supercharged Ionplex Facial Mist® throughout the day for a refreshing burst of moisture.

Directions:- After moisturizer, apply generously and evenly to your face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply at least every two hours. - Tip: Moisturize before applying your sunscreen! Mineral sunscreen blends best when your skin is hydrated. - Tip: This 100% mineral sunscreen can be worn alone or under makeup—let your SPF completely absorb before layering on your favorite foundation for a seamless blend.- Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. 

Precautions:- For external use only. Use as directed- Warnings: Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

product_description: A cult-favorite retinol and AHA serum clinically shown to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles while visibly firming and brightening for glowing, younger-looking skin.

Suggested Usage:
-Use at night, two to three times weekly.

-Apply the side without the mesh onto the under-eye area, positioning just below the lash line and just above the cheekbone. 
-Peel off outer blue mesh, starting at the outer corner, then gently pat to smooth.

-Discard patches, then pat in any remaining product.
-At night, follow with a thin layer of Retinol Youth Renewal Serum and Retinol Youth Renewal Night Cream (each sold separately). 
-Always apply SPF in the morning.

product_name: Bye Bye Under Eye Bags Daytime Treatment for Eye Bags, Puffiness and Crepey Skin
product_description: A temporary daytime under eye treatment for moderate to severe eye bags that works to depuff, tighten, and smooth in just 15 minutes.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Puffiness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:To Apply On Bare Skin:	
• Bye Bye Under Eye Bags Daytime Treatment is designed to work when skin is completely dry, so allow 2-3 minutes for your cleanser and eye cream to fully absorb before applying this product. 
• Apply a pea-size amount of product per eye. 
• With light pressure, use fingertip to glide evenly from inner to outer eye corners 2-3 times—minimal blending is best. 
• Use fingertip to gently tap or “feather” the product outward at the edges of each eye. 
• Relax your face and let it go to work. Don’t squint or smile until the product is completely dry (about 15 minutes). Then you’re good to go!

To Apply Over Makeup:	
• Bye Bye Under Eye Bags Daytime Treatment is designed to work over makeup when all products are fully dried down. You can use a tissue or blotting paper to remove excess oil if needed. 
• A pea-size amount per eye can be applied on top of makeup. Please note: If wearing with concealer, foundation or powder, Bye Bye Under Eye Bags Daytime Treatment needs to be the last product you apply on top in order to work most effectively.
• With light pressure, use your fingertip to glide evenly from inner to outer eye corners 2-3 times—minimal blending is best. 
• Use your fingertip to gently tap or “feather” the product outward at the edges of each eye. 
• Relax your face and let it go to work. Don’t squint or smile until the product is completely dry (about 15 minutes). Then you’re good to go!

To Remove: 
• Do not sleep with product on eye area. Always remove with IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm or your favorite waterproof makeup remover. 
• Gently massage Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm or waterproof makeup remover onto dry skin, focusing on the areas with product.  
• Rinse well with warm water or wipe off with a face cloth and pat dry. 

IMPORTANT NOTE: Bye Bye Under Eye Bags Daytime Treatment should be applied and removed as directed. Contact with eyes should be avoided. The product should not remain on the skin overnight.  Before bed, always remove the product with a waterproof makeup remover, such as Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm. If irritation is experienced, stop use of the product. If irritation persists or is severe, seek medical attention.

Sunday Riley says:
-"I have four kids and never seem to get enough sleep. I keep a bottle of Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream for Dark Circles in the refrigerator, and massage it in and around my eyes every morning while I'm waiting for my coffee to brew. Sunday says:
-"I use C.E.O. 15% Vitamin C Brightening Serum twice a day. In the morning, I make a vitamin C cocktail for my skin by mixing two to three pumps with three drops of C.E.O Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil. I massage it well into my skin and it rapidly soaks in, and my skin visibly glows. In the morning, I follow with Good Genes All-In One Lactic Acid Treatment and a dab of Tidal Brightening Enzyme Water Cream and then sunscreen. In the evening, I use C.E.O. 15% Vitamin C Brightening Serum after my retinoid step (A+ High-Dose Retinol Serum and Luna Retinol Sleeping Night Oil). I then follow with ICE Ceramide Moisturizing Cream." (All additional products are sold separately.)

product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask
product_description: Shop Shiseido’s Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask at Sephora. This is a set of under-eye masks.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply after cleansing and before applying serum or moisturizer.
-Take the tray out of the packet and pick up each mask, one at a time. 
-Affix the narrow side of the mask to the inner corner of the eye and smooth out so the larger end covers the outer corner of your eye. Repeat on the other side. 
-Leave on for 15 minutes, then gently peel off. 
-Using light pressure, gently massage the remaining essence into the skin around your eyes. 
-Any essence remaining in the packet can be applied around the mouth for additional smoothing. 
-Use as needed, recommended two to three times per week.

product_name: Mini GO OFF Makeup Dissolving Mist
product_description: An epic, continuous mist that slips over skin and instantly dissolves all makeup on contact without leaving skin feeling tight or dry.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
- Spray mist 8 to 10 inches away from the face until evenly coated. Spray for 2 to 3 seconds to remove light makeup, 5 to 6 seconds to remove a full face. 
-To apply like Patrick Starrr, spray mist in an “O” circle around face and then an “S” shape across the face. Finish with a "/" slash motion across the face.
-Massage into skin and gently wipe off. 
-Double down on stubborn makeup by pairing with the GO OFF Juiciest Makeup Remover Wipes (sold separately). After applying mist, use super-sized wipe to remove makeup with one swipe.
-Follow with your daily face cleanser.

product_description: A clean eye cream with niacinamide and collagen peptide that targets signs of aging and corrects all four eye zones: browbone area, eyelid, crow's feet, and under-eye.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Puffiness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply 2 times per day, morning and night, on clean, dry skin. 
-Gently massage half a pea-size amount across the brow bone area, eyelid, outer corners, and under eye.
-For optimal results, try out Kiehl’s Since 1851’s expert Eye Zone Workout massage techniques aimed to treat all four eye zones to visibly tighten, firm, and depuff for younger-looking eyes:
Smooth the Eyelid: Start from the inner corner and gently press the formula outward towards the temple.
Provided a lifted look to the Browbone Area: Gently press and hold, using an upward rolling motion to gently lift the brow.
Target Crow's Feet: Gently massage, using an upward and outward motion, out to the temple.
Visibly De-Puff the Under-Eye: Tap lightly and rapidly from the inner corner to the outer corner. 

Recycling Instructions:
-Packaging made from post-consumer recycled materials.

-Limit time in the sun, especially from 10am–2pm.
-Wear long-sleeve shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses. 
-Children under six months: ask a doctor.

product_name: Instant FIRMx® Eye Temporary Eye Tightener

target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines/Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness/Elasticity, and Puffiness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Start by cleansing with a non-oily cleanser. Avoid using eye cream if possible. If you prefer to use eye cream, allow the product to fully absorb and dry. 
-Shake the tube and squeeze out a pea-size amount on the top of the hand.
-Using fingertips or a clean, dry makeup brush, pick up a tiny amount of the product and apply onto a completely dry eye area for best results.
-Using upward strokes, spread a thin layer of the gel onto the under-eye area, crow’s feet, "11" lines between the brows, and beneath and above the brow bone (but not on the moveable eyelid). 
-Let the product dry for approximately five minutes while remaining expressionless. Do not squint or smile.
-If you notice any white residue, moisten a cotton swab (or your fingertip) and remove excess by gently patting the edges.
-Once the product is completely dry, you are good to go. You can gently pat on makeup such as eyeshadow, under-eye concealer or powder. 
-To prolong the effects of Instant FIRMx® Eye, avoid water-based makeup. 
-For external use only.

Suggested Usage:
-Apply SPF as the last step in your skin routine, whether that's over makeup, over skincare, or directly onto skin. Pull back hair and close your eyes and mouth before application.
-Hold the mister about 10 inches from skin. Mist all over face and neck in a gentle circular motion. For full SPF protection, spritz at least seven times.
-Keep eyes and mouth closed for five to seven seconds while the mist settles onto skin. There's no need to rub in the formula, but you can if you want.

Do not assume that if no reaction is seen after a few applications that you can apply this product more frequently. Pay close attention to how your skin responds, and adjust usage accordingly.-If sensitization occurs (redness, flaking, tenderness, or drying of skin), reduce frequency of use.-If sensitization persists, discontinue use. -Protect your skin daily with sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

product_description: A facial massage tool that enhances beauty rituals by promoting the lifting and smoothing of the skin, leaving the face lifted and radiant after use.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Start with a clean face and prep skin with a facial oil or serum.

-Keep the tool flat against the face and begin with the forehead. Scrape in an upwards motion from the eyebrows to the hairline.

-Move to the cheeks and scrape in an outwards motion starting from the crease of the nose until the ear.

-Move to the jawline and use the end of the Gua Sha tool with the two curves. Start from the chin and scrape until the ear. Gently massage the Gua Sha tool into the ear to release tension.

-For the under-eye area, very gently scrape the Gua Sha from the inner corner of the eye outwards to the temple. Because the area is so sensitive, it is important to only apply light pressure.

product_description: An innovative formula with an encapsulated duo of time-release retinol and retinal, clinically shown to improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, discoloration, and texture, with minimal irritation.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply pea-size amount to clean, dry skin at night.
-Start by using twice per week and gradually increase.
-Follow with moisturizer of choice after use. Add one to two drops of Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil (sold separately) for an extra boost of moisture.
-Apply sunscreen the following morning after use.

Why should I only use this at night?
Biossance recommends this serum in evening use because retinol and retinal can cause sensitivity to the sun. It is also important to wear a daily sunscreen every morning and reapply during the day.

How can I combine with other Biossance serums?
Biossance recommends using Squalane + Retinol Night Serum in the evening and choosing a day serum, like Squalane + Vitamin C Dark Spot Serum or Squalane + Copper Peptide Rapid Plumping Serum (both sold separately). Be sure to use a small, pea-size quantity of retinol when starting out, even alternating between the nights used. Since their retinol is a powerful serum, the brand doesn't recommend layering with other treatment products, but encourages you to layer with other moisturizers and oils.

Recycling Instructions:
-Remove and dispose of pump.
-Empty and rinse remaining product from bottle and cap.
-Place bottle and cap in curbside recycling.
-The outer carton is made from sustainable FSC-certified sugarcane paper and can be placed in curbside recycling.

-Apply onto clean skin.

-Apply a thin layer to clean skin.

product_description: A facial massage tool that enhances beauty rituals by promoting the lifting and smoothing of the skin, leaving the face lifted and radiant after use.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Start with a clean face and prep skin with a facial oil or serum.

-Keep the tool flat against the face and begin with the forehead. Scrape in an upwards motion from the eyebrows to the hairline.

-Move to the cheeks and scrape in an outwards motion starting from the crease of the nose until the ear.

-Move to the jawline and use the end of the Gua Sha tool with the two curves. Start from the chin and scrape until the ear. Gently massage the Gua Sha tool into the ear to release tension.

-For the under-eye area, very gently scrape the Gua Sha from the inner corner of the eye outwards to the temple. Because the area is so sensitive, it is important to only apply light pressure.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Limit initial use to three times per week, gradually increasing frequency to every other night, and then to each evening as tolerated. -Apply a pea-size portion to your face after cleansing and toning. -Carefully avoid your lips and eyes (including eyelids and eye corners). -Can be used on orbital bone perimeter if desired. 
Please note: -Some people may experience a delayed sensitized reaction to one percent retinol. Do not assume that if no reaction is seen after a few applications that you can apply this product more frequently. Pay close attention to how your skin responds, and adjust usage accordingly.-If sensitization occurs (redness, flaking, tenderness, or drying of skin), reduce frequency of use.-If sensitization persists, discontinue use. -Protect your skin daily with sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

-Try Drunk Elephant’s "Passion Play Smoothie" for hydrated, radiant younger-looking skin. In the palm of your hand mix a pea-size amount of A-Passioni™, one pump of B-Hydra™, and one pump of Lala™ (sold separately), and apply to skin. 

Retinol products are not recommended for use by pregnant or nursing mothers. Always check with your doctor before using any new products while pregnant or nursing.

product_description: A blue-light device clinically shown to address acne and blemishes and prevent the appearance of future flare-ups for cleaner-, clearer-, healthier-looking skin.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Before you begin, make sure device is fully charged and your skin is clean and dry. 
-Take two adhesive strips, attaching one to either side of the device. 
-Remove cover strips and, using a mirror, place device onto the area of skin you want to target, using light pressure to secure in place. 
-Press On/Off button for one second to turn on device. The button will illuminate, and your 20-minute session will begin.
-After 20 minutes, a short beep will signal the end of the session, and device will turn off automatically. 
-Be sure to remove device carefully, gently peeling it away from your skin. 
-Discard single-use adhesive strips after each session. 
-Clean your device before every use with a soft, dry cloth or cleansing wipe. 
-FaceGym strongly recommends performing a patch test to detect any skin sensitivity before using your device. Directions on how to perform your patch test are inside your Acne Light Shot manual.

Suggested Usage:
-Limit initial use to three times per week. Gradually increase frequency to every other night, then each evening as tolerated. 
-Apply one to two pumps to face and neck after cleansing and toning. 
-Carefully avoid the lips, eyes (including eyelids), and corners of the eyes. 
-Note: Some people may experience a delayed sensitized reaction to one percent retinol. Do not assume that if no reaction is seen after a few applications that you can apply this product more frequently. Pay close attention to how your skin responds and adjust usage accordingly.
-If sensitization occurs (redness, flaking, tenderness, or drying of skin), reduce frequency. 
-If sensitization persists, discontinue use. 
-Protect skin daily with sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

product_name: Retinol Firming Cream with Hyaluronic Acid for Targeted Treatment
product_description: A treatment, powered by pure retinol and peptides, that visibly firms and smooths the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Use as the last step of your evening skincare routine.

Week One: 
-Apply a small amount (the size of a grain of rice) on targeted areas such as around the eyes, smile lines, forehead, or other areas of concern every other night.

Week Two:
-Apply the same amount as week one but increase usage to every night.

Week Three: 
-Starting from week three, increase usage to a pea-sized amount. 
-You can continue using only on areas of concern or spread lightly over entire face.

-Use of retinol may cause a stinging sensation, redness and/or flakiness of the skin. 
-Please read instructions carefully before use and allow two weeks for skin to adapt. 
-It is recommended to use the product at night as the product may increase the skin’s sensitivity to sunlight. 
-Wear a sunscreen during the day while using the product. 
-Avoid using beauty devices, scrub, exfoliating products at the same time.

product_name: Full-Size FIRMx® Face & Eye Firmers 2-Piece Kit

target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Puffiness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Instant FIRMx® Temporary Face Tightener:
-Start by cleansing with a non-oily cleanser. Avoid using serum or moisturizer if possible. If you prefer to use serum or moisturizer, allow the products to fully absorb and dry. 
-Shake the tube and squeeze out a dime-size amount on the top of the hand. 
-Using fingertips or a clean, dry makeup brush, pick up a tiny amount of the product and apply onto completely dry skin for best results.
-Using upward strokes, spread a thin layer of the gel onto forehead creases, fine lines along the temple area, nasolabial folds, and enlarged pores. 
-Let the product dry for approximately five minutes while remaining expressionless. Do not squint or smile.
-If you notice any white residue, moisten a cloth, cotton swab, or fingertips and remove excess by gently patting the edges.
-Once the product is completely dry, you are good to go. You can gently pat on makeup, such as foundation or powder.
-To prolong the effects of Instant FIRMx®, avoid water-based makeup. 
-For external use only.

FIRMx® Collagen Hydra-Gel Face & Eye Patches:
-Use enclosed tweezers to gently lift and separate a delicate gel patch.
-Apply onto clean, dry skin.
-Use half-moon patch shape for the under-eye area.
-Use oval patch shape for the forehead, nasolabial folds, and lip lines.
-Relax and enjoy for 10 to 15 minutes.
-Discard patches after use and gently pat remaining serum into skin.
-For external use only.

product_name: Abeille Royale Double R Renew & Repair Eye Serum
product_description: A two-in-one eye serum that combines the power of two exclusive, honey-powered technologies to visibly illuminate and lift the eye area.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
To be used after the application of the bestselling Abeille Royale Youth Watery Oil and Double R Serum (each sold separately).
-Apply one to two pumps to the eye contour area morning and night before using your cream.

For best results or to create your own at-home facial moment, follow instructions provided by GUERLAIN’s Facialist below and in our video tutorial:

For Puffiness and Dark Circles:
-Warm a pump of the texture between your fingertips. 
-Smooth the contour of each eye with three fingers, alternating between one hand and then the other, from the inner corner to the temple. 
-Using your fingertips, gently tap underneath the eye from the inner corner outwards and then in the other direction.  

For Crow’s Feet Wrinkles: 
-Placing your arm behind your head, position your index, middle and ring fingers on the opposite temple. 
-Slide your three fingertips horizontally outwards. 
-Place the three fingers of your second hand below the first hand, with your fingertips opposite each other. 
-Slide your six fingers vertically outwards (up or down depending on the hand) over the entire crow’s feet area.
-Place your middle finger under the eyebrow and your ring finger under the eye. 
-In a scissors position, slide towards the temples to open the eyes. 
-Stop at the temples and smooth outwards with both fingers.
-Place the base of the palm of your hand under each eye and smooth the eye contour in an outward direction. 
-With each sweep, place the product on the lashes with the rest of the palm.

Recycling Instructions:
-Packaged in a double-chamber glass bottle made of recycled glass.

product_description: A refill pack of 60 adhesive strips for the Acne Light Shot device (sold separately).
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Before you begin, make sure your Acne Light Shot device (sold separately) is fully charged and your skin is freshly cleansed and dry. 
-Take two adhesive strips and attach one to either side of the device. 
-Remove cover strips and, using a mirror, place device on area of skin you would like to address.
-Use light pressure to secure strips in place.
-Press On/Off button for one second to turn on device. The button will illuminate and your 20-minute session will begin. The hands-free design lets you get on with your day during the session. 
-After 20 minutes, a short beep will signal the end of the session and your device will turn off automatically. 
-Be sure to remove device carefully, gently peeling it away from your skin. 
-Discard adhesive strips after each use. 
-Be sure to clean your device before every use with a soft, dry cloth or cleansing wipe. 
-FaceGym strongly recommends performing a patch test to detect any skin sensitivity before use. Directions on how to perform a patch test are found inside the Acne Light Shot manual.

product_description: A lightweight and hydrating bronzing mousse that allows you to choose your depth of dark—four hours for the iconic dark tan or eight hours for an intense, extra-dark tan.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturize any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, and feet.
-For best results, apply using the tan applicator mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. 

-Wait until touch dry before getting dressed.

 Precautions:

-Wear gloves during application. 
-Wash hands thoroughly after use. 
-Perform a patch test 24 hours prior to use. 
-Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. 
-Stop using if skin becomes irritated. 
-Avoid contact with lips. 
-Do not get into eyes. If this happens, simply rinse thoroughly with warm water. 
-Do not inhale and use in a well-ventilated area; ensuring adequate extraction and ventilation during use. 
-Self-tan may stain, so take care not to get it on furnishings, wool, nylon, paintwork, or light hair. 
-Do not spray on or near carpet, furniture, or fabrics. 
-Store upright below 30°C/86°F.

product_name: Capture Totale Super Potent Eye Serum
product_description: An awakening eye serum that visibly diminishes signs of aging and helps reduce the appearance of puffiness, fine lines, and dark circles.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines/Wrinkles, Dark Circles, and Puffiness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Apply Super Potent Eye Serum morning and night using the Alpha-Eye technique:

Depuff: 
-Apply the eye contour serum from the temple to the inner corner of the eye, maintaining light pressure with the applicator. 
-Next, smooth the upper eyelid. 
-Repeat the motion two or three times around each eye.
Smooth: 
-Glide the applicator across the lower lid from the inner corner of the eye to the outer corner to brighten dark circles and smooth fine lines. 
-Repeat the motion on the upper eyelid, following the brow bone to the crow’s feet. 
-Repeat the motion two or three times around each eye.
Lift: 
-Lift the upper eyelid, smoothing and stretching the skin upward with the applicator. 
-Follow the shape of the brow bone. 
-Repeat the motion two or three times around each eye.
Sculpt: 
-Lift the arch of the eyebrow and knead the brow line with your fingertips for five seconds on each brow.

-Complete your ritual with the Firming and Wrinkle-Correcting Eye Cream (sold separately).

product_description: A set that includes a liquid exfoliant, an acid booster, and a retinol treatment to visibly even tone and make your skin look firmer.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-The products in this kit contain advanced ingredient strengths for advanced results. 
-Paula's Choice recommends patch testing first, then slowly incorporating each product into your routine over the course of a few weeks. 
-Avoid using all products together initially. 
-Gradually increase application frequency and combine products as tolerated. 
-Always finish with SPF 30+ for daytime.

Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant: 
-Start slowly. Apply every other day and note skin's response. 
-Use up to twice daily.
-For daytime, always finish with SPF 30+.
-For nighttime, follow with the rest of your routine. 
-If you have a salicylate allergy, check with your physician before using any products that contain salicylic acid.

10% Azelaic Acid Booster: 
-Apply once or twice daily after cleansing, toning, and exfoliating.
-Wear alone or mix into your favorite serum or nighttime moisturizer.
-For daytime, always finish with SPF 30+.
 
CLINICAL 1% Retinol Treatment: 
-Limit initial use to three times per week, gradually increasing frequency to every other night, then each evening as tolerated. 
-Apply a pea-size amount to face after cleansing and toning. 
-Carefully avoid the lips, eyes (including eyelids), and corners of the eyes. 
-Can be used on orbital bone perimeter if desired. 
-Some people may experience a delayed sensitized reaction to the CLINICAL 1% Retinol Treatment. 
-Do not assume that if no reaction is seen after a few applications that you can apply this product more frequently. 
-Pay close attention to how your skin responds and adjust usage accordingly.
-If sensitization occurs (redness, flaking, tenderness, or drying of skin), reduce frequency of use or mix one pump of the Clinical 1% Retinol Treatment with your favorite Paula’s Choice serum or PM moisturizer (sold separately). 
-If sensitization persists, discontinue use. 
-Protect skin daily with sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

product_description: A dermatologist-tested tool with a unique shape to expertly remove visible blackheads at home.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Clean the tool before each use with alcohol.
-Wash skin with warm to hot water and gentle cleanser to open pores. Pat skin dry.
-With one hand, hold the tool with thumb and index finger (similar to a tweezer). With the oppositive hand, hold skin taut.
-Hold flat portion of tips parallel to surface of skin with tips placed on either side of visible blackheads. Do not use on lips, in or around eye, eyelid, under eye area and/or eyebrows.
-Press down lightly to force the blackhead from the skin.
-Once the blackhead starts to rise above the surface of the skin, squeeze the tool to close the tips around the blackhead.
-Roll the tool forward and lift the curved tips up and away from the skin to remove the blackhead. If irritation occurs, discontinue use immediately.

Precautions:  
-For use on clean skin and visible blackheads only. 
-Do not use on skin that has not been washed or has makeup applied as this can drive bacteria into the skin and cause irritation. 
-Do not use on broken and/or irritated skin including but not limited to acne, whiteheads, sunburn, psoriasis, eczema and/or any other skin condition. 
-Handle with care. Item is sharp and may result in undesired damage to skin if used in a manner not listed.

-Smooth the eyelid, starting from the inner corner and gently pressing the formula outward toward the temple.

-Start with a clean face.

product_name: Future Solution LX Intensive Firming Contour Serum
product_description: An luxurious serum that provides long-lasting, intense moisture and a tightening effect for smooth, supple skin.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
For face: 
-Use morning and evening after balancing skin.  
-Pump once into palm and apply the serum to cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin.  
-Smooth the serum gently over the face, including the jawline, moving from the center of the face outward. 

For neck:
-Pump once into palm and using both palms, blend into the skin in upward movements. 
Use the serum with the following additional massage techniques. 

Lift up massage: 
-Apply upward pressure with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat six times.   
-Place four fingers of each hand on your chin and move them upward toward the temples so both palms of hands fit over the cheeks, and then lift them. Repeat six times.

Lift up exercises:
-Open your eyes wide while looking in the mirror.
-Pull your lips to the left to stretch the right cheek.
-Hold for 10 seconds. 
-Pull your lips to the right to stretch the left cheek.
-Hold for 10 seconds. 
-Stretch the corners of your mouth outwards, into a smile, and hold for 10 seconds.

how_to_use:

-Twist knob to close.
-Apply Shave Pillow (sold separately), or any shave-prep product, liberally onto skin.          
-Glide—don’t press—the razor gently along your skin.
-Use slow, short strokes to avoid nicks and cuts.

Recycling Instructions:

-Once the bin is full, simply recycle the entire bin with the blades safely inside.
-Refer to heyhanni.com/recycle for more detailed info.

product_name: Prep Set Tan Face and Body Brush
product_description: A super fluffy, dome-shaped brush to ensure a streak-free, blended self-tanner application.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Mist Prep Set Tan (sold separately) or your glow giver of choice over your face, neck, and décolletage before using the Prep Set Tan Brush to buff the product into your skin. 
-Use circular motions to blend the product into your skin, making sure you don’t forget your ears or back of the neck.
-For an ultra-sunkissed glow, spritz your fake tan mist onto the shoulders and buff into the skin using the brush. 
-You can also apply your fake tan directly onto the brush before blending into the skin, depending on your preference.
-Apply tan where you’d usually contour (the jawline, cheekbones, and hairline) for a sculpted finish that’ll last days on end.
-If you’re tanning your entire body, the Prep Set Tan Brush is the perfect pro tool for blending excess tan over tricky areas like your hands and feet.
-To clean, dip the brush head under running warm water for two to three seconds. Use a baby shampoo, brush cleanser, or gentle face wash to massage the bristles of the brush before swirling the brush head in the palm of your hand or a brush mat. Rinse and repeat until the water runs clear and any soapy suds and residue have rinsed away. Gently squeeze any excess water from the brush head, reshape, and lay your brush flat on a clean towel to fully dry.

product_name: Skin Perfecting 25% AHA + 2% BHA Exfoliant Peel
product_description: A rinse-off, professional-strength AHA/BHA peel that dramatically and visibly brightens skin, refines texture, smooths the look of wrinkles, and unclogs pores in just 10 minutes.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Acne and Blemishes
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin once a week, avoiding your immediate eye area and lips. -Leave on for 10 minutes. -Rinse with warm water. -Pat dry.
Precautions: -Do not use other exfoliants while using this peel. -Do not use more than once per week.-Slight tingling may occur. If this happens, it should subside. If it does not subside or if it intensifies, immediately rinse with warm water. -Do not use on compromised, sensitized skin.-This product contains alpha hydroxy acids, which may make your skin more sensitive to the sun, increasing the possibility of a sunburn. -Always apply a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater every day. -When outdoors, wear protective clothing whenever possible, seek shade, and avoid prolonged sun exposure.
Sun Protection Advice When Using Any AHA Exfoliant: This product contains 8% glycolic acid, an ingredient that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and the possibility of sunburn. Always apply a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater every day. When outdoors, wear protective clothing whenever possible, seek shade, and avoid prolonged sun exposure. 
Start Slowly: Apply every other day and note skin's response. Then use up to twice daily. For daytime, always finish with SPF 30+. For nighttime, follow with the rest of your routine. If you have a salicylate allergy, check with your physician before using any products that contain salicylic acid.

product_description: A limited-edition, three-piece set of plant-powered formulas—featuring a full size of the bestseller Double Serum—for smooth, radiant, and visibly lifted skin
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Double Serum: 
1. Turn the dial to select a customized dose for your skin’s needs. 
2. Mix both phases in the palm of your hands. 
3. Apply to clean face and neck with light pressing motions, working from the center of your face outward. 4. Follow with Day or Night Cream. 

Total Eye Lift: 
1. Warm Total Eye Lift between your fingers for a few seconds before applying. 
2. Using 3 fingertips, gently press under the eyes, over the eyelids, and onto lashes—from inner corners of eyes to temples. 
3. Tap gently between eyebrows. 

V-Facial Intensive Wrap: 
Apply to clean, dry skin. Smooth a thick layer over the lower part of face and neck. Avoid eye contours. Leave on for 10 minutes. 
Optimize the refining effect by performing Clarins’ exclusive Manual Auto-Lifting Method during the last few minutes: 
1. Place left elbow in palm of right hand, and rest chin in left palm. 
2. Gently move head to the left. Completely relax the weight of head in palm for a few seconds. 
3. Repeat four times. Then perform the same movements on the right side of face. Rinse with cool water.

product_description: A two-in-one microneedling device and liquid vitamin treatment for visibly brighter, smoother, and more rejuvenated skin in one shot.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Just like an interval training session, use Faceshot™ every two days or once a week during your evening routine to ensure a good exfoliation regime.
-Ensure the device is fully charged and that the skin is thoroughly cleansed.
-Use a tissue to carefully snap open the ampoule at the point indicated by the ring on the vial‘s neck.
-Remove the microneedle cartridge from the sterile packaging and remove the smaller lid.
-Insert the opened ampoule halfway into the microneedle cartridge and shake to transfer the liquid. Once empty, dispose of the empty ampoule.
-Place the small lid back onto the microneedle cartridge and push the microneedle cartridge into the FaceShot.
-Take off the protective needle cover from the microneedle cartridge and insert the clear outer ring into the FaceShot and begin the application.
-There are four levels of intensity to ensure a maximum and tailored result.
-Do not use the microneedle for more than three seconds in one area.
-Some redness or a prickling and itchy feeling are normal after use.
-Do not apply makeup for at least 30 minutes after.
-Always use sunscreen the morning after using the device.
-Avoid sun exposure and strenuous activity for 24 hours after treatment.
-As with all FaceGym‘s pro tools, you can scan the QR code on pack to unlock FaceGym‘s exclusive step-by-step tutorial with more tips and tricks on how to use your Faceshot™.

Caution: Faceshot™ sterile needle tips are single-use only and designed to be disposable. Handle the needle tips and glass ampoule with care and dispose of carefully. Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes; if contact occurs, please rinse well with water. In the unlikely event of irritation, discontinue use.

product_description: A recyclable bin to safely store your used blades.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
To refresh your blade:
-If you shave every day, change your blade one to two times per week. 
-If you shave three to four times per week, change your blade every two weeks. 
-If you shave one to two times per week, change your blade every three weeks.

To dispose of a used blade:
-Twist razor knob to open wings. 
-Carefully shake blade out of razor.
-Holding used blade by its short ends (or on the top and bottom), carefully insert into the bin slot.
-Ensure bin cap is securely closed at all times. 

Recycling Instructions:
-Once bin is full, simply recycle the entire bin with blades safely inside.
