product_description: A refill pack for your Faceshot™ device that includes four Liquid Vitamin Ampoules and four needle cartridges for brighter-looking, smoother, and fresh-feeling skin.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Just like an interval training session, use Faceshot™ every two days or once a week during your PM routine to ensure a good exfoliation regime.
-Ensure the device is fully charged and that your skin is thoroughly cleansed.
-Use a tissue to carefully snap open the ampoule at the point indicated by the ring on the vial’s neck.
-Remove the microneedle cartridge from the sterile packaging and remove the smaller lid.
- Insert the opened ampoule halfway into the microneedle cartridge and shake to transfer the liquid. Once empty, dispose of the empty ampoule.
-Place the small lid back onto the microneedle cartridge and push the microneedle cartridge into the Faceshot.
-Take off the protective needle cover from the microneedle cartridge and insert the clear outer ring into the Faceshot and begin the application.
-There are four levels of intensity to ensure a maximum and tailored result. 
-Do not use the microneedle for more than three seconds in one area. 
-Some redness or a prickling and itchy feeling are normal after use.
-Do not apply makeup for at least 30 minutes after use. 
-Always use sunscreen the morning after using the device. 
-Avoid sun exposure and strenuous activity for 24 hours after treatment.
-As with all of FaceGym’s pro tools, you can scan the QR code on the pack to unlock an exclusive step-by-step tutorial with more tips and tricks on how to use your Faceshot.

Caution: 
-Faceshot sterile needle tips are single-use only and designed to be disposable. 
-Handle the needle tips and glass ampoule with care and dispose of carefully. 
-Keep out of reach of children. 
-For external use only. 
-Avoid contact with your eyes; if contact occurs, please rinse well with water. 
-In the unlikely event of irritation, discontinue use.

Please note:

Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward. Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately. Keep out of reach of children. This product contains active ingredients; we suggest testing a small amount on forearm before using.

-Apply a full dropper to the palm of your hand. 
-Massage onto your face in a heart shape: Using all fingers of both hands, start at the center of your face and move out to ears. Glide hands from the sides of your face down under your chin.

product_description: An FDA-cleared LED device for the face that targets wrinkles and blemishes for visibly smoother, clearer skin in just three minutes.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Redness, and Acne and Blemishes
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:Set Up
- Plug USB charging cord into port connector on device
- Plug USB charging cord into Universal USB Power Adapter (not included) and into outlet for charging (use only UL or other locally certified and compliant USB  power adapter)
- Charge your device for 2-4 hours
- Place device in protective storage bag when note in use 

Instructions for Use
- After cleansing, place device over the face, securing strap around head
- Press and hold power button for two seconds to turn on device, select light setting (red, blue, or red and blue) 
- Device will automatically turn off after completion of a 3-minute session
- Remove device and follow with the Alpha Beta® Daily Peel (sold separately)

Troubleshooting
If the device is not turning on:
(1) Press and hold the on/off button for 2 seconds
(2) Check that the device is fully charged (Power Indicator Light is illuminated and solid)

If the device is not charging:
(1) Check that the USB charging cord is firmly inserted into device (Power Indicator Light is illuminated)
(2) Try a different USB Power Adaptor to ensure it is working properly

If the device shuts off abruptly, prior to 3-minute session:
(1) Device is designed to shut off automatically after 3 minutes
(3) System may shut off after multiple, repeated uses. Allow device to rest for a minimum of 10 minutes and try again

If you are still having issues, please contact Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Client Care at +1-888-830-SKIN

-What does post-consumer recycled (PCR) material mean? It’s a material (such as a plastic water bottle) that's already been used and would otherwise have been thrown away. This reduces the creation of new plastic waste.​
-What does plant-derived plastic mean? It's made from an agricultural byproduct of processing sugarcane that would otherwise be discarded.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Glow2OH Dark Spot Toner: 
-At night, pour Dark Spot Toner onto a cotton pad and swipe over clean, dry face in a circular motion. 

Precautions:
-For external use only. 
-Use as directed. 
-This product contains active ingredients; OLEHENRIKSEN suggests testing a small amount on forearm. 
-Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. 
-Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product for a week afterward. 
-Avoid eye area. 
-In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

Lemonade Smoothing Scrub:
-Apply to wet skin and gently massage in. 
-Leave on for up to two minutes before rinsing, or rinse right away. 
-Use two to three times per week.

Precautions:
-For external use only. 
-Use as directed. 
-This product contains active ingredients; OLEHENRIKSEN suggests testing a small amount on forearm. 
-Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. 
-Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product for a week afterward. 
-Avoid eye area. 
-In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

Dewtopia 20% Acid Night Treatment: 
-At night, apply evenly to face and neck.

Precautions:
-For external use only. 
-Use as directed. 
-If irritation occurs, reduce frequency of application or discontinue use if persistent. 
-Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. 
-Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward. 
-Avoid eye area. 
-In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately. 
-Keep out of reach of children. 
-This product contains active ingredients; OLEHENRIKSEN suggests testing a small amount on forearm before using. 

Set Precautions:
-These products contain active ingredients; OLEHENRIKSEN suggests testing a small amount on forearm before using or layering them together. 
-If you are new to skincare acids, phase these products into your routine slowly; introduce them one at a time, and start using once per week. 
-As your skin adjusts, you can increase frequency. 
-If irritation persists, discontinue use. 
-Sunburn Alert: Cover areas where AHAs/PHAs have been applied with sunscreen or protective clothing prior to sun exposure, and for up to a week afterward. 
-Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately. 
-Keep out of reach of children.

product_name: Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes + Niacinamide
product_description: A triple-powered microdermabrasion treatment amplified by active enzymes, micro-exfoliants, and caffeine for smoother, visibly radiant skin in as little as two minutes.
target_skin_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply an even layer to clean, wet skin.
-Leave on for up to up to two minutes, allowing enzymes to activate.
-Add water and gently massage in circular motions to complete visible resurfacing treatment.
-Rinse off.
-Use one to three times per week.
-Sensitive skin? Apply a small amount to wet skin, diluting the product in the palm of your hand with water before application.

-Make sure skin is wet before application.
-When massaging in circular motions, remember to add water and use light pressure.
-Use on alternate days to Kombucha + 11% Aha Exfoliation Power Toner (sold separately) and other exfoliating treatments.

Precautions:
-Do not use on irritated or damaged skin.
-Do not use within 24 hours of use of other physical or chemical exfoliation products.
-Do not use more frequently than three times per week.
-Always use a broad-spectrum SPF as part of your daily skincare routine.

Recycling Instructions:
To recycle these glass bottles and jars, follow these easy steps:
-Take off the lid, pump, or dropper and dispose of each into their proper container. You can check your local recycling authority's guidelines to make sure you use the correct one.
-Wash the glass container thoroughly in hot soapy water, rinse, then dry. If you skip this step, containers may contaminate other materials in a mixed waste stream, like paper.
-Place in your recycling bin and your glass bottle and jars can now be infinitely recycled.

To sterilize our glass bottles and jars for reuse, here's a few options:
-Wash the glass container thoroughly in hot soapy water, rinse, then dry. Place them on a cool oven rack with equal spacing and heat them at 120° for 15 minutes. Let cool.
-Wash the glass container thoroughly in hot soapy water, rinse then dry. Place the bottles and jars into a large pan of boiling water for 10 minutes. Let cool.
-Your like-new containers are now ready for pretty much anything, such as supplement storage, pen holder, propagation vessel...get creative.

product_name: Self Tan Purity Bronzing Water Face Mist
product_description: An ultra-lightweight mist infused with 100 percent natural tanning agents.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:

-Shake well before use. 

-Close eyes and spray five to six full pumps onto clean dry skin, applying evenly over face, neck, and décolletage. The delicate mist easily absorbs into skin under or over make-up, as primer and setting spray, with no need to rub or blend in. 

-Within 4-8 hours, it develops into a flawless golden glow that smells beautiful, with no transfer onto clothing or bedding. 

-Spritz as often as desired throughout the day to refresh skin and boost your glow. Use every day for a tan that lasts for days and fades evenly. 



 Precautions:

-For external use only. 

-Wear gloves during application. Wash hands thoroughly after use. We recommend a patch test is carried out 24 hours prior to use. 

-Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Stop using if skin becomes irritated. Avoid contact with lips. Do not get into eyes, if this happens simply rinse thoroughly with warm water. 

-Do not inhale, use in a well-ventilated area; ensuring adequate extraction and ventilation during use. 

-Self-tan may stain, so take care not to get it on furnishings, wool, nylon, paintwork or light hair. Do not spray on or near carpet, furniture or fabrics. 

-Store upright below 30°C/86°F.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply each morning after Serum using the Clarins Method for Face to boost microcirculation and encourage lymphatic drainage. 
-Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.

-Warm product in palms; then gently place on cheeks, forehead, neck, and décolleté. 

-Follow by pressing into skin with firm yet gentle pressure. Never tug, pull, or stretch. 
-Move outward from cheeks toward ears, from center of forehead to temples, and from jaw down over décolleté. 


 Precautions:
-Do not use on damaged or broken skin.

-When using this product, keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove.

-Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs.

-Keep out of reach of children. If product is swallowed, get medical help or contact a poison control center right away.

-Apply to all skin exposed to the sun.

-Children under six months, ask a doctor.


Sun protection measures:

-Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with broad-spectrum SPF of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including:

- Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 AM to 2 PM

- Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses

- Reapply at least every two hours

- Use a water-resistant sun screen if swimming or sweating

Suggested Usage:
Facial Treatment Cleanser:
-Take a pea-size amount into your palm and work into a foamy lather with water.
-Gently cleanse your face and neck.
-Rinse off with lukewarm water.

Facial Treatment Essence (Pitera Essence):
-Pour two to three shakes into your hand, press your palms together, and then pat all that Pitera goodness all over your face.

product_name: V Shaping Facial Lift Depuff & Contour Serum with Hyaluronic Acid
product_description: A gravity-fighting serum fights the effects of UV rays and pollution to visibly lift, sculpt, slim, and de-puff facial features for perfect V contours.
target_skin_concerns: Puffiness and Loss of Firmness/ Elasticity
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply a thin layer of serum all over your face. 
-Support the full weight of your head with the palms of your hands, which provides the ideal pressure necessary for draining tissues without pulling.
-Eyes and forehead: Place base of palms over eyes and eye contours, covering the forehead with your fingers. Rest head in hands for 10 seconds.
-Cheekbones: Open hands slightly and place palms over cheekbones. Press and release three times for 10 seconds each time. 
-Face: Cover entire face with your hands, separating them a little to leave room for your nose for ten seconds. 
-Chin and jaw: Rest the lower part of your face in your hands, placing index fingers behind ears. Rest head in hands for 10 seconds.
-Under the jaw: Clench fists and place under your jaw. Let the weight of your head rest on your fists for 10 seconds.
-Collarbone:  Place fingertips in the hollows of the collarbones and gently exert pressure. Press and release three times. Perform before and after the method.
-Follow with your Clarins day and/or night cream.

product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel
product_description: A professional treatment inspired by professional treatments, this clinically proven overnight glycolic peel exfoliates, retexturizes, and brightens skin while you sleep.
target_skin_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Pores
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Before bed, wash and dry skin. 
-Apply the innovative, presoaked dual-textured pad evenly over face, neck, chest, and shoulders (where we typically have the most sun damage). 
-The dual-sided pad allows for custom exfoliation: One side has a special basket-weave pattern for more-intense exfoliation, and the other has a smoother side to buff and polish.
-Do not rinse off. 
-Apply moisturizer after 15 minutes, if you like. 
-Leave on overnight; rinse off in the morning. 
-Use one night a week.
-Some tingling may occur; if you experience sensitivity, leave on for a shorter time, or rinse off and pat dry.
-Note: Test this product on a small patch of skin inside the elbow prior to use. Discontinue use if you experience irritation.

Precautions:
-For external use only. 
-Avoid contact with eyes. 
-If irritation persists or allergic reaction occurs, rinse off immediately, discontinue use, and consult a physician. 
-Keep out of reach of children.  
-Sunburn alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.

product_description: A lightweight, easy-to-apply classic mousse that dries quickly with no self tan smell and an even fade.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturize any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, and feet.

-For best results, apply using the Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. For your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the mitt over your hands and feet. 

-Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. 

-Allow four to eight hours before showering to reveal your developed tan.

-To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturize daily, exfoliate regularly, and reapply as desired.


Precautions:
-Carry out a patch test 24 hours before use. 

-External use only. 

-Don’t apply to broken or irritated skin. 

-Stop if irritation occurs. 

-Self tan may stain. 

-Avoid contact with eyes or lips and rinse if contact occurs. 

-Sun safety warning: this product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn.

product_description: A quick-fix facial treatment that quickly helps tighten, firm, and smooth the look of fine lines, deep wrinkles, and pores for a temporary effect.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines/Wrinkles, Pores, and Loss of Firmness/Elasticity
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Start by cleansing with a non-oily cleanser. Avoid using serum or moisturizer if possible. If you prefer to use serum or moisturizer, allow the products to fully absorb and dry. 
-Shake the tube and squeeze out a dime-size amount on the top of the hand. 
-Using fingertips or a clean, dry makeup brush, pick up a tiny amount of the product and apply onto completely dry skin for best results.
-Using upward strokes, spread a thin layer of the gel onto forehead creases, fine lines along the temple area, nasolabial folds and enlarged pores.

Precautions:
-For external use only.

Suggested Usage:
-Apply a thin layer to clean skin, avoiding your eye area.

-Leave on for 15 to 20 minutes or until mask is completely dry.
-Rinse with warm water.

-After day five, use two to three times per week to maintain results.

Precautions:
-For external use only.

-Avoid direct contact with eyes or mouth. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
-Discontinue use if skin becomes irritated.

-Store in a cool, dry place out of direct sunlight.

target_skin_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Skin Tone
how_to_use:
Massage 1 to 2 pumps onto face and neck. Use AM & PM.

When you run out, get the refill pod.

SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

ASSEMBLY
This starter kit includes a refill pod that locks into your refillable jar. Peel off the foil, then assemble immediately. DO NOT TOUCH THE PRODUCT TO AVOID CONTAMINATION. 
1. Peel the foil off of the pod. 
2. Twist the pump onto the pod. 
3. Drop it into the jar and twist on. 

Our caps and pumps are made from mixed materials.  Unfortunately, they are not recyclable due to their size and  composition. 
Our jars are made from styrene acrylonitrile (SAN).  Unfortunately, the jars are not recyclable due to its composition. 
Our refill cups are made from polyethylene and polypropylene.  Just rinse it out and toss it in your recycling bin. 
Our refill foil seals are made from aluminum. Just rinse it off and  toss it in your recycling bin. 
Our cartons are made from Forest Stewardship Council certified  paperboard. Just breakdown the box and toss it in your  recycling bin. 
Our leaflets are made from paper. Just toss it in your recycling  bin.

product_description: A dentist-invented whitening device that uses heat and light technology to visibly brighten smiles fast, without sensitivity.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Charge: 
-Your device will blink a brilliant blue light when charging. 
-When charging is complete, all eight bands will light up.

Turn on: 
-Connect your mouthpiece to the GLO control. 
-Push the GLO button once to turn on your device. 
-Your mouthpiece will not illuminate but will warm up while you apply lip care and whitening gel. 

Prep your mouth: 
-Apply lip care to inside and outside of lips. 
-Remove cap from whitening gel vial.
-Squeeze a small amount of gel out of the vial onto the soft bristles. 
-Apply gel in a circular motion to front of teeth that are visible when you smile. 
-Each GLO vial will have enough gel for three more GLO sessions, plus extra for touch-up whitening.

Start GLO session: 
-Push the GLO button once more to begin treatment. 
-Your GLO mouthpiece will illuminate bright blue. 
-The eight bands on the control will countdown your eight-minute treatment.

Finish Session: 
-When your session time is almost complete, your GLO control will begin to blink. 
-At the end of your GLO session, your control will beep and your mouthpiece will shut off—this concludes your eight-minute GLO session.
-Each GLO treatment consists of three consecutive eight-minute sessions. 
-Spit out any excess GLO whitening gel.
-Reapply GLO whitening gel for the next session. 
-You may also reapply GLO lip care if desired.
-The orange heat indicator light will remain on, keeping your mouthpiece warmed and ready in between your GLO sessions.
-Repeat steps two and three for a total of three applications.

Complete treatment: 
-Double tap the GLO button to shut off your device. 
-Your device will automatically turn off after five minutes of inactivity.
-Disconnect your mouthpiece from your GLO device.
-Rinse the mouthpiece thoroughly to remove any excess whitening gel. 
-Dry with a clean cloth.

Recycling Instructions:
-The box is made of compostable sugarcane and can be placed in your recycling bin.

product_description: A two-step face treatment that drives essential actives into the skin through a reviving oxygen exchange for an instantly dewy, healthy-looking complexion.

-This product is recommended after sun exposure.

-Mix Hyaluronic Cushion Gel with Activating Powder in a bowl. 

-Spread the formula in a thick, even layer on clean, dry skin using the supplied spatula.

-Starting from the jaw, quickly spread in upward strokes. (The thicker and more uniform the application, the easier it will be to remove in one piece.)

-Leave on for five to seven minutes, or up to 15 for maximum hydration. 

-To remove the mask, lift off and wipe away any excess with a damp cotton ball. 

-Do not rinse.

-Use once a week.

product_name: Smart Night™ Clinical MD Multi-Dimensional Repair Treatment Retinol Serum
product_description: A skin-repairing, nighttime treatment that combats visible signs of aging with the multidimensional power of retinol for comforting hydration.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-To help optimize the results of retinol, CLINIQUE suggests using it as part of a regimen with other products to fight visible signs of aging, such as:
-In AM: Use the Smart™ Custom-Repair Serum with the Smart™ SPF 15 Custom-Repair Moisturizer (each sold separately).
-In PM: Use the Smart™ Custom-Repair Serum + Clinique Smart Night™ Retinol with the Smart Clinical™ MD Resculpt or Revolumize or the Smart Night™ Custom-Repair Moisturizer for added comfort if needed (each sold separately). 

What you should know about retinol:
-Retinol is an extremely effective and powerful ingredient for anti-aging. You may experience mild redness, a warm, tingling sensation, or ﬂaking (skin exfoliation). These conditions are normal, temporary indications that the formula is working. 
-If you experience increased discomfort when using CLINIQUE Smart Night Clinical MD Multi-Dimensional Repair Treatment Retinol, revert to once every other night until skin adjusts. -This adjustment can take up to four weeks.
-First-time users and those with drier skin types may want to use CLINIQUE’s Smart Night Clinical MD Multi-Dimensional Repair Treatment Retinol every other night for more than two weeks to give skin additional time to adjust. For added comfort, use a mild cleanser and layer an additional moisturizer over the Smart Night Clinical MD Multi-Dimensional Repair Treatment Retinol. 
-Limit sun exposure in general. Be sure to apply a sunscreen of SPF 15 or higher during the day with use and one week after stopping use of the Smart Night Clinical MD Multi-Dimensional Repair Treatment Retinol. Note that extreme weather conditions such as wind or cold may be more irritating, so take the proper precautions to protect your face.

product_description: A toner and treatment essence in one formula, sake visibly brightens while sebocytine helps reduce oil production and refine the look of pores.

product_description: A 24-karat gold vibrating bar that instantly makes skin feel and appear toned, lifted, contoured, and revived.
target_skin_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Completely remove all makeup to start on a clean face. 

-Apply a pea-sized amount of your typical facial moisturizer on skin.


Cheekbones: 

-Start at the jawline, gently pushing the bar upwards to sculpt the cheek. 

-Continue this motion for five minutes on one side of the face before repeating on the other side. 
-Avoid pushing down when sculpting the cheek bones as the desired effect is pushing upwards, towards the temples.


Jawline/chin: 

-Starting at the jawline, gently push the bar in towards the neck and under the chin. 

-Repeat this motion for five minutes moving along under the area of the chin and jaw.


Tech lines: 

-Using the index finger and thumb, gently stretch the skin on either side of the tech lines. 

-Quickly glide the bar up and down in a vertical movement to help reduce lines and prevent future visibility.

-Tech lines are the two horizontal lines that appear across neck from looking down at your phone or other types of technology.

product_name: Self Tan Purity Bronzing Water Mousse
product_description: A lightweight, clear, water-foam formula with a tropical scent, infused with 100 percent naturally-derived and vegan-friendly tanning agents that refresh and revive your skin.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturize any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, and feet.
-For best results, apply using the tan applicator mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. 
-Wait until touch dry before getting dressed.

-Rinse off after four hours for the iconic dark tan or after eight hours for an intense but natural-looking, extra-dark tan. 
-To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturize daily, exfoliate regularly, and reapply as desired. 


 Precautions:
-For external use only. 
-Wear gloves during application. 
-Wash hands thoroughly after use. 
-Perform a patch test 24 hours prior to use. 
-Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. 
-Stop using if skin becomes irritated. 
-Avoid contact with lips. 
-Do not get into eyes. If this happens, simply rinse thoroughly with warm water. 
-Do not inhale and use in a well-ventilated area; ensuring adequate extraction and ventilation during use. 
-Self-tan may stain, so take care not to get it on furnishings, wool, nylon, paintwork, or light hair. 
-Do not spray on or near carpet, furniture, or fabrics. 
-Store upright below 30°C/86°F.

product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel
product_description: A professional treatment inspired by professional treatments, this clinically proven overnight glycolic peel exfoliates, retexturizes, and brightens skin while you sleep.
target_skin_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Pores
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Before bed, wash and dry skin. 
-Apply the innovative, presoaked dual-textured pad evenly over face, neck, chest, and shoulders (where we typically have the most sun damage). 
-The dual-sided pad allows for custom exfoliation: One side has a special basket-weave pattern for more-intense exfoliation, and the other has a smoother side to buff and polish.
-Do not rinse off. 
-Apply moisturizer after 15 minutes, if you like. 
-Leave on overnight; rinse off in the morning. 
-Use one night a week.
-Some tingling may occur; if you experience sensitivity, leave on for a shorter time, or rinse off and pat dry.
-Note: Test this product on a small patch of skin inside the elbow prior to use. Discontinue use if you experience irritation.

Precautions:
-For external use only. 
-Avoid contact with eyes. 
-If irritation persists or allergic reaction occurs, rinse off immediately, discontinue use, and consult a physician. 
-Keep out of reach of children.  
-Sunburn alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.

product_description: A must-have set of fast-acting formulas that target acne.
target_skin_concerns: Acne and Blemishes, Oiliness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Drying Lotion: 
-Don‘t shake the bottle. 
-Before bed and after cleansing and toning, dip a cotton swab into the pink sediment at the bottom of the bottle. 
-Dab directly on the surface blemish, don‘t rub in. 
-Let dry and rinse off in the morning. 
-Don‘t use on broken skin. Don‘t apply to eye or lip area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

Buffering Lotion: ​
-Shake well before applying directly onto affected areas with clean fingertips​, avoiding eye area. 
-Don‘t apply anything on top (such as moisturizer or night cream). ​ ​​
-Use every evening as needed.

Drying Cream: 
-Dab small amount onto affected areas until product blends into skin. 

Precautions:
-Don‘t use on broken skin.
-Don‘t apply to eye or lip area.
-Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets in the eyes, rinse well.
-The Buffering Lotion and Drying Cream are not recommended for use with topical prescriptions or sensitive skin. If skin irritation develops and persists, discontinue use. ​

Recycling Instructions:
-Remove cap and pump. Note: Although pump is made of recyclable materials, it is non-recyclable, as it is unable to be disassembled.
-Completely wash and rinse inside and outside of glass bottle.
-Recycle or repurpose lass bottle.

product_description: A dual-purpose liquid cleanser and toner that removes deep-down dirt and oil for clear, smooth, shave-ready skin.

 Precautions:

product_name: Irish Moor Mud Purifying Black Mask

target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Uneven Texture

Suggested Usage:
-Using fingertips, apply evenly to clean skin. 
-Leave on for up to 10 minutes. 
-Remove with a warm, damp, dark washcloth and rinse skin thoroughly of any remaining residue. 
-Use two to three times a week or as often as desired. 

Precautions:
-For external use only.
-Avoid eye area.
-Sunburn alert: this product contains lactic acid, an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin‘s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. 
-Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

product_name: Rose Quartz Facial De-Puffing & Lifting Gua Sha

-For best results, use for three to five minutes daily.
-To enhance your glow, apply Noni Glow Plumping Face Oil (sold separately) to skin after cleansing and misting.
-For additional soothing benefits, place stone in the refrigerator for a few minutes or run under cold water. The stone is naturally cool, but this extra reduction in temperature will aid your efforts to increase circulation and visibly benefit your skin.

product_description: A powerful, oil-absorbent powder designed to help decongest oily skin and diminish the appearance of large pores.

product_description: Shop Shiseido’s Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream at Sephora. This daily cream hydrates and visibly addresses wrinkles.

-Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-size amounts, then dot the cream on the five points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
-Gently smooth the cream from the center outward over your face. 
-Apply an additional pearl-size amount to your neck and sweep the cream upward to your jawline.

product_description: A mini-size velvety serum to help rebuild and protect your skin’s natural barrier with the concentrated Miracle Broth™ to help visibly calm redness and inflammation.

product_description: A cream-to-oil three-in-one cleanser, mask, and balm.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
To use as a deep cleansing anti-wrinkle wash:

-Start by applying Multi-Miracle Glow to a dry face, all over using Charlotte's Pro Collagen Wonder Workout (sold separately).  
-Apply cream to the tips of the middle three fingers on each hand. 
-Blend into your cheeks starting from the lower cheek, near the mouth, in a sweeping motion up and out. 
-Repeat this motion, moving up the face to simulate blood flow, and penetrate collagen-boosting ingredients deeper into the skin. 
-To blend in the excess cream and de-congest puffed up cheeks, tap your cheeks with your fingertips in a pitter-patter motion, starting from the top of the cheek bone and working down.


As an overnight regenerating facial mask:

-Cleanse as in step one, then apply a thin layer all over the face, avoiding the eye contour.  
-Massage into skin using the Pro Collagen Wonder Workout from step one. 
-Leave on for 10 minutes or overnight for best results, then wash off the excess.


To use as a beauty balm: 
-Apply directly onto targeted area and massage in to cheat a polished, supermodel finish.


Charlotte’s tip: 
-Use this cleanser, mask, and balm as the first step in your skincare routine, followed up by the Magic Night Cream (sold separately).

product_description: A hydrating mask famous for its cloud-like whipped texture that leaves skin super-smooth and dewy.

-Cleanse skin with oil-free cleanser and apply the NuFACE Gel Primer.
-Using medium pressure along the natural contours of the face and light pressure on the neck, glide the Trinity in an upward motion. Target forehead, eyebrows, cheeks, jawline, and neck.

product_description: A jade roller that supports lymphatic drainage to reduce the appearance of puffiness, and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Begin rolling by starting at the center of the face, under the eyes and cheekbones, moving out toward the hairline in short, gentle strokes.
-Move down to the jawbone, still working in short strokes, starting at the chin, and moving out toward the bottom of the ears.
-Next, roll above the eyebrows and forehead in an out and up motion.
-Use the smaller roller around the eyes and take extra care in this area.
-To end, very gently roll down the sides of the neck and then toward the center of the clavicle.

Recycling Instructions:
Place outer carton into paper recycling.

product_name: GOOPGLOW 20% Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Glow Serum
product_description: A daily glow serum that combines two powerhouses, 20 percent L-ascorbic acid (vitamin C) and hyaluronic acid, leaving skin firmer, brighter, and smoother.
target_skin_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Unscrew the tip of the serum activator and squeeze the contents into the bottle containing the pure vitamin C powder.

-Screw the cap onto the bottle and shake well until the powder fully dissolves. Let it sit for one to two minutes after shaking.

-Replace the cap with the dropper; it’s now ready to use.

-Apply twice daily on clean, dry skin.

-Use during the day to help protect your skin from free radicals and UV rays and in the evening to help counterbalance oxidative damage from the day.
 
-Smooth a few drops between your palms and pat into skin.
 
-Use SPF daily to maintain results and help protect skin from future damage.
 
-For best results, use within three months of activating the serum.

Precautions:

product_description: A daily drink for glowing skin, made with six skin-supporting antioxidants: vitamins C and E, CoQ10, grape-seed extracts, lutein, and zeaxanthin.

product_description: A powerful five-piece set curated to diminish and target visible signs of aging.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
Glycolic Foaming Cleanser:
-Replace your regular cleanser one to three times a week (one to two times for dry to combination skin and two to three times for combination and oily skin). 
-Massage onto wet skin using upward, circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. 

Glycolic Acid Toner: 
-Twice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. 
-Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. 

Collagen Moisturizer SPF 15: 
-After cleansing and toning, apply daily all over face before sun exposure.
-Reapply frequently to maintain protection and after perspiring or swimming. 
-May be used under makeup or alone. 

Super Collagen Mask: 
-Apply a thin layer of mask on clean skin, avoiding the eye area. 
-Wait 20 minutes and rinse thoroughly with warm water. 
-Use two to three times a week for best results. 

Glycolic Eye Cream: 
-Pat a small amount of gel under and around the eye area using the ring finger. 
-Follow the orbital bone from the inner corners to the outermost corners. 

Precautions:
-Avoid eye area, if product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.
-Glycolic Foaming Cleanser, Toner, and Eye Cream: 
-Not recommended for use with topical prescriptions, acne-erupted, or sensitive skin. If irritation develops and persists, discontinue use. 
-Sunburn alert: These products contain an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin‘s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

For your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the mitt over your hands and feet.

-To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturize daily, exfoliate regularly, and reapply as desired.


Precautions:

-External use only. 

-Don’t apply to broken or irritated skin.

-Self tan may stain. 

-Avoid contact with eyes or lips and rinse if contact occurs. 

-Sun safety warning: this product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn.

product_name: PMD Personal Microderm with Hand & Foot Kit
product_description: A revolutionary at-home device that provides the same brilliant results as professional, in-office microdermabrasion treatments.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Prior to using the PMD, it is important to thoroughly cleanse the skin, making sure that it is free from all make up, dirt, and oils. 
-Once the skin is clean, allow it to dry completely before you begin. 
-Before using the tool on your face, practice on your arm and on your neck; these areas are not as sensitive as the face and will allow you to get used to motion and the way a treatment is performed. 
-Use the white disc first. This disc is our most sensitive disc. It is important to see how your skin responds to this disc before moving on to more abrasive discs. 
-After you have tested the unit on your arm and/or neck and feel ready to move on to your face, use a free hand to pull the skin tight in the treatment area and continue to move the PMD Personal Microderm in an upward motion across the skin. Do not make more than two passes over one area during the treatment. 
-Following the treatment, use a toner to neutralize the pH balance in the skin and a recovery moisturizer. 
-After each use, clean the cap and the disc with rubbing alcohol or an antibacterial soap. 
-Wait six to seven days between treatments.

 Precautions:
-The Personal Microderm should only be used once a week. Microderm removes the top layer of dead dull skin and your body needs one week to rejuvenate. Be patient. Use it consistently and you will see results. 
-Anyone using chemical peels or products containing acids including hydroxy acids, malic acid, lactic acid, and/or retinoids or retin A ingredients must not use the Personal Microderm at the same time. This may cause skin to be too sensitive and use of the Personal Microderm is not recommended. Before it is safe to use the Personal Microderm, you must discontinue use of these products for at least seven days. 
-Consult your doctor or dermatologist if you are unsure that the Personal Microderm is suitable for your skin.

how_to_use:
Apply a thick layer over your face and neck. Leave for 20 minutes. Wet hands with warm water and gently massage to exfoliate skin before rinsing. Use up to 2 times a week. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothes, and limit sun exposure after using this product for a week afterwards.

Our jars are made from glass. Just twist off the cap, rinse out the  jar, and toss it in your recycling bin.  
Our shives (the clear disk that protects the formula) are made  from PETG, which is the most recycled and universally accepted  plastic. Just rinse it off and toss it in your recycling bin. 
Our caps are made from mixed materials. Unfortunately, the  caps are not recyclable due to their size and composition. 
Our cartons are made from Forest Stewardship Council certified  paperboard. Just breakdown the box and toss it in your  recycling bin. 
Our leaflets are made from paper. Just toss it in your recycling  bin.

product_description: A transparent gel-to-water formula that deeply hydrates for up to 72 hours and starts to develop into a natural, golden tan in just three hours.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Moisturize dry areas including hands, elbows, knees, ankles, feet, and any light hair. 

-For best results, apply to skin using a Tan Applicator Mitt in upward circular motions, ensuring all areas are covered. Finally, lightly glide the excess gel on your mitt over hands and feet. The product gives a light gleam to guide your application and ensure no missed patches. 

-Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. No need to rinse off. You will see a glow after three hours, but before getting skin wet, allow eight hours for your natural looking tan to fully develop. 

-To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturize daily, exfoliate regularly, and reapply as required.

-Carry out a patch test 24 hours prior to use. 

-Wash palms after use. 


 Precautions:
-Formula may stain.
-Do not apply to sensitive, broken, or irritated skin. 
-Stop if irritation occurs. 
-Do not get in eyes; if you do rinse well with water. 
-Avoid contact with lips. 
-Store below 30°C/86°F.  
-Sun safety warning: This product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn. Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin aging, skin cancer, and other harmful effects to the skin even if you do not burn.

product_name: Plantscription™ Retinol Night Moisturizer with Alpine Flower
product_description: A nourishing overnight moisturizer with pure, high-grade retinol to visibly diminish lines, pores & unevenness. Proven to instantly enhance skin’s moisture & radiance as it works to improve suppleness & visible tone & texture.
target_skin_concerns: Dark spots, Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Prep your skin with Plantscription™ Anti-Aging Power Serum-Apply a pea size amount of Plantscription™ Retinol Night Moisturizer PM, avoiding the eye area.
-For first two weeks, use every other night, then increase to nightly.
-Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after. 
Precautions:-Plantscription™ Retinol Night Moisturizer is not recommended for use on irritated, broken or prescription-treated skins.-You may experience mild redness, a warm, tingling sensation or flaking (skin exfoliation).
-These conditions are normal, temporary indications that the formula is working.
-If you experience increased discomfort when using Plantscription™ Retinol Night Moisturizer nightly, revert to once every other night until skin adjusts; this adjustment can take up to four weeks.
First time users and those with drier skin types may want to use Plantscription™ Retinol Night Moisturizer every other night for more than two weeks to give skin additional time to adjust.
-For added comfort, use a mild cleanser & layer an additional moisturizer over Plantscription™ Retinol Night Moisturizer.
Limit sun exposure in general. Be sure to apply a sunscreen of SPF 15 or higher during the day while using & one week after stopping use of Plantscription™ Retinol Night Moisturizer. Note that extreme weather conditions such as wind or cold may be more irritating, so take the proper precautions to protect your face.

product_description: A revolutionary at-home device that provides the same brilliant results as professional, in-office microdermabrasion treatments.
target_skin_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Pores
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Prior to using the PMD, it is important to thoroughly cleanse the skin, making sure that it is free from all make up, dirt, and oils. 
-Once the skin is clean, allow it to dry completely before you begin. 
-Before using the tool on your face, practice on your arm and on your neck. These areas are not as sensitive as the face and will allow you to get used to motion and the way a treatment is performed. 
-Use the white disc first. This disc is our most sensitive disc. It is important to see how your skin responds to this disc before moving on to more abrasive discs. 
-After you have tested the unit on your arm and/or neck and feel ready to move on to your face, use a free hand to pull the skin tight in the treatment area and continue to move the PMD Personal Microderm in an upward motion across the skin. Do not make more than two passes over one area during the treatment. 
-Following the treatment, use a toner to neutralize the ph balance in the skin and a recovery moisturizer. 
-After each use, clean the cap and the disc with rubbing alcohol or an antibacterial soap. 
-Wait six to seven days between treatments. 

 Precautions:
-The Personal Microderm should only be used once a week. Microderm removes the top layer of dead dull skin and your body needs one week to rejuvenate. Be patient. Use it consistently and you will see results. 
-Anyone using chemical peels or products containing acids including hydroxy acids, malic acid, lactic acid, and/or retinoids or retin A ingredients must not use the Personal Microderm at the same time. This may cause skin to be too sensitive and use of the Personal Microderm is not recommended. Before it is safe to use the Personal Microderm, you must discontinue use of these products for at least seven days. 
-Consult your doctor or dermatologist if you are unsure that the Personal Microderm is suitable for your skin.

product_description: A lightweight, classic lotion that tailors to your individual skin tone, with added moisturization for a long-lasting tan and even fade.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturize any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, and feet.

-For best results, apply using the Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the mitt over your hands and feet. 
-Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. 

-Allow four to eight hours before showering to reveal your developed tan.

-To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturize daily, exfoliate regularly, and reapply as desired.

Precautions:
-Carry out a patch test 24 hours before use. 
-External use only. 
-Don’t apply to broken or irritated skin. 
-Stop if irritation occurs. 
-Self tan may stain. 
-Avoid contact with eyes or lips and rinse if contact occurs. 
-Sun safety warning: this product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn.

Recycling Instructions:
Fully recyclable glass jar is made from 25% recycled glass; cap and disk are made from recyclable polypropylene (#5) and foam.
Carton liner is made from recyclable fluted cardstock; carton is made from recyclable FSC-Certified card stock (harvested from trees located in responsibly managed forests).

Separate and flatten liner and carton; place in recycling bin. Unscrew cap and remove disk from glass jar; rinse and place disk in recycling bin. Remove foam liner from inside of cap; toss foam liner in trash. Rinse cap to remove any residue before recycling.

Certified Plastic Negative: This product has a negative plastic footprint. Prima removes twice as much plastic waste from the environment as we use in our packaging in partnership with RePurpose Global.

Our jars are made from glass. Just twist off the cap, rinse out the  jar, and toss it in your recycling bin.  
Our shives (the clear disk that protects the formula) are made  from PETG, which is the most recycled and universally accepted  plastic. Just rinse it off and toss it in your recycling bin.

Our cartons are made from Forest Stewardship Council certified  paperboard. Just breakdown the box and toss it in your  recycling bin.

product_name: Rejuvenating Scalp + Fuller Hair Therapy Set
product_description: A GloPRO® set that naturally awakens the scalp, delivering key nutrients and creating the ideal environment for hair that appears fuller, healthier, and stronger.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Use the GloPRO® device on clean, product-free hair that‘s either damp or dry. 
-Part hair into sections, lightly hold hair taut and in parallel with parting line, and then gently glide GloPRO® back and forth over the scalp for about five seconds per target area. 
-Use the precision tip on the serum tube to part hair. 
-Apply two to three drops of serum directly onto each target area of scalp, massaging gently as you go. 
-Use treatment at least three times per week. 
-May be used daily. 

Precautions:
-Do not roll the GloPRO® attachment through loose hair. 
-Do not use the attachment on lips, around the eyes, or on the body.

-Pour all the liquid serum base into the bottle containing the 15% ascorbic acid powder. 
-Screw the pump onto the top of the bottle and shake for one minute until the powder dissolves fully.
-Bubbles will form—that’s okay—Your C-Firma™ Fresh Day Serum is ready to use.

product_name: The Glow Around 4-Piece Travel Skincare Essentials Set
product_description: A set with everything you need for the look of a pore-less glow, featuring travel sizes of a cleanser, toner, moisturizer with sun protection, and a full-size exfoliator.
target_skin_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Dullness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Start with Total Cleans’r.
-Use day and night. 
-Wet skin. 
-Lather. 
-Rinse. 
-Pat dry. 

-Next, use Pre-Show Glow.
-Wet reusable applicator and your face with water. 
-Pour a dime-size amount of solution onto the applicator. 
-Scrub face for 30 to 60 seconds. 
-Rinse.
-For best results, use twice a week on non-consecutive days. 
-The reusable applicator is machine washable. 
-Place the applicator in a delicates bag and wash with cool water on a gentle cycle. 
-Lay flat to air dry—do not stretch.
-Follow Pre-Show Glow with Fat Water.
-Apply to palms. 
-Pat and press over your face, letting it absorb. 
-During the day, finish with Hydra Vizor.
-Apply evenly on clean, dry skin. 
-Make sure to always use Hydra Vizor after Pre-Show Glow to protect your skin from the sun. 

Recycling Instructions:
-The set box is 100 percent recyclable.

-Close your eyes and mouth. 
-Hold the mister about 10 inches from skin. 
-Mist all over face and neck in a gentle, circular motion.

product_description: A complete, travel-friendly regimen for your skin’s daily needs—without a single drop of synthetic chemicals.

Step 1: Apply Regenerating Cleanser onto dry skin. Massage onto face and neck until product turns white, then rinse with warm water.* 

Step 2: Mist Hydrating Floral Essence onto face and neck.*

Step 3: Massage 1 to 2 pumps of Rejuvenating Serum onto face and neck.

Step 4: Massage Restorative Eye Creme around the entire eye area in circular motions.*

Step 5: Massage 1 to 2 pumps of Repairative Moisturizer onto face and neck.

Step 6: Roll Retinoic Nutrient Face Oil over face and neck and massage. 

Step 7: Use Resurfacing Mask once a week. Apply a thick layer onto clean skin. Leave for 15 minutes, then rinse with warm water.*

*Warning: Avoid direct contact with eyes. 


Our jars are made from glass. Just twist off the cap, rinse out the  jar, and toss it in your recycling bin.  
Our shives (the clear disk that protects the formula) are made  from PETG, which is the most recycled and universally accepted  plastic. Just rinse it off and toss it in your recycling bin. 
Our bottles are made from glass. Just twist off the pump, rinse  out the bottle, and toss it in your recycling bin.  
Our caps and pumps are made from mixed materials. Unfortunately, the  caps are not recyclable due to their size and composition. 
Our cartons are made from Forest Stewardship Council certified  paperboard. Just breakdown the box and toss it in your  recycling bin. 
Our leaflets are made from paper. Just toss it in your recycling bin.

product_description: An alpha-hydroxy cream-to-foam formula with a no-blade tool that lifts away dead skin cells to reveal a fresh, radiant, super-hydrated complexion.
how_to_use:

-Massage any residual product into skin. 
-Use one or two times a week, am or pm.  Follow with your regular skincare routine. 
-Use in conjunction with UV protection while avoiding excessive sun exposure. 

 Precautions:
-Use only as directed. 
-Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician.
-Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

Recycling Instructions:
Fully recyclable glass jar is made from 25% recycled glass; cap and disk are made from recyclable polypropylene (#5) and foam.
Carton liner is made from recyclable fluted cardstock; carton is made from recyclable FSC-Certified card stock (harvested from trees located in responsibly managed forests).

Separate and flatten liner and carton; place in recycling bin. Unscrew cap and remove disk from glass jar; rinse and place disk in recycling bin. Remove foam liner from inside of cap; toss foam liner in trash. Rinse cap to remove any residue before recycling.

Certified Plastic Negative: This product has a negative plastic footprint. Prima removes twice as much plastic waste from the environment as we use in our packaging in partnership with RePurpose Global.

product_name: Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream
product_description: A silky, anti-aging eye cream that visibly reduces dark circles, depuffs eye bags, and smooths fine lines for re-hydrated, younger-looking eyes.
target_skin_concerns: Dryness, Dark Circles, and Puffiness
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Use daily, morning and night, on a cleansed, makeup-free face. 
-Use after eye serum and before face serum and moisturizer. 
-Gently dab a pea-size amount along your lower eye contours, then smooth all around your eye area with light strokes (from inner to outer eye corners) until the cream is completely absorbed. 
-Follow with Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Dark Spot Correcting Cream SPF 30 or Renergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Firming and Dark Spot Correcting Moisturizer SPF 30 (each sold separately). 

Target visible signs of aging and fatigue with a re-energizing eye massage: 
-After applying the eye cream, form a small "peace sign" by placing your index and middle fingers on each side of your eyebrow, then press and lift the eyes by gently sliding your fingers from the base of your eyebrows to the tips. 
-Repeat this step three times. 
-Visibly correct dark circles and de-puff under-eye bags by using your ring finger to gently tap along your lower eye contours (from inner corners to temples).

product_description: An airy, light moisturizer that absorbs quickly to boost skin’s bounciness and suppleness for a more youthful, healthy look.

-Use this firming cream and wrinkle treatment after you cleanse, tone, treat, and target.
-Use daily, both in the morning and again in the evening as a night cream.

-Place a pearl-size amount, approximately one half to three fourths of an inch in diameter, into your palm.
-Apply evenly onto your face by dotting on forehead, both cheeks, and chin.
-Spread the cream softly across the entire face, starting in the center and moving outward, massaging into skin to maximize absorption.

product_description: A rose quartz roller that supports lymphatic drainage to reduce the appearance of puffiness, and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Begin rolling by starting at the center of the face, under the eyes and cheekbones, moving out toward the hairline in short, gentle strokes.
-Move down to the jawbone, still working in short strokes, starting at the chin, and moving out toward the bottom of the ears.
-Next, roll above the eyebrows and forehead in an out and up motion.
-Use the smaller roller around the eyes and take extra care in this area.
-To end, very gently roll down the sides of the neck and then toward the center of the clavicle.

Recycling Instructions:
Place outer carton into paper recycling.

product_description: An exfoliating glycolic micellar water to strip your tan down and start again.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Use at least three days after initial tan applications.

-Mist all over body until skin is totally saturated, lather, and leave for five minutes.

-Wash off in shower, buffing skin gently until color is totally removed.


 Precautions:
-Carry out a patch test 24 hours prior to application. Do not apply to broken, irritated, or hyper sensitive skin.
-This product does not contain sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn. Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin aging, skin cancer, and other harmful effects to the skin even if you do not burn.

how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-Pour into Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water bottle (sold separately). 
-Twist cap to secure.
-Exfoliate 24 hours before tanning. Moisturize dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles, and elbows prior to application.
-Mist until skin is totally saturated, covering face. Leave hands and feet until last before blending with a tanning mitt using sweeping motions.
-Thoroughly wash palms after use.

Precautions:
